33b4('bum): stobs rnams mi dmigs/stobs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/stobs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par gral 'gyur/de la byang chub
33b5('bum): kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs/byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang mi dmigs na/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de
33b6('bum): bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mau dmigs/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/
33b7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la 'phags pa'i
34a1('bum): bden pa rnams mi dmigs/'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/'phags pa'i bden pa
34a2('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs/bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/bsam gtan nyid kyang mi
34a3('bum): dmigs na/bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs/tshad med pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/tshad med pa
34a4('bum): nyid kyang mi dmigs na/chud med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nying lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la gzugs med pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs/gzugs med
34a5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi
34a6('bum): /de bzhin nyid lta dmigs parA ga lnga 'gyur/de la rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs/rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rnam par thar pa nyid kyang mi dmigs
34a7('bum): na/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs/mthar gyis gnas pa'i/
34b1('bum): snyoms ngur 'jug pa'i bzhin nyid mi dmigs twa/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/
34b2('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mi dmigs/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
34b3('bum): nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rnam par thur pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smyon pa med pa nyid kyang mi
34b4('bum): dmigs na/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la mngon par shes pa rnams mi
34b5('bum): dmigs/mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/mngon par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la
34b6('bum): 'gyur/de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs/ting nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
34b7('bum): lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs/gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gzungs
35a1('bum): rtswa rnams kyi dang don nyid lha dmigs par kA la 'gyur/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi
35a2('bum): de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/de bzhin gshugs pa'i stobs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par gral 'gyur//
35a3('bum): dri la mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs/mi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang mi domigs na/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta
35a4('bum): darigs par ga la 'gyur/de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs/so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/so so yang dag par rig
35a5('bum): pa nyid kyang mi dmig se na/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la snying rje chen po mi dmigs/snying rje chen po'i de bzhin/
35a6('bum): nyid mi dmigs te/snying rje chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na/snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga lnga 'gyur/de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
35a7('bum): mi dmigs/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
35b1('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lha dmigs pa dag la 'gyur/de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras du mi dmigs/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te//rgyun du zhugs/
35b2('bum): pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmibyas par bra la 'gyur/de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmig so/lon cig/
35b3('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/lhan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs ni/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs
35b4('bum): par ga la 'gyur/de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na
35b5('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par pA la 'gyur/de la dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs/dgra bcom po nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/dgra bco
35b6('bum): po nyid kyang mi dmigs na/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la rang byang chub mi dmigs/rang byung chub kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te///
35b7('bum): rang byang chub nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la yo gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
36a1('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/
36a2('bum): de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rnam
36a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/de bzhin
36a4('bum): nyid 'di ni zab po ste/de la gzugs mi dmigs/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs
36a5('bum): bar ga la 'gyur/de la tshor ba mi dmigs/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/
36a6('bum): de la 'du shes mi dmigs/'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/'du shes nyid kyang mi dmigs na/'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la
36a7('bum): 'du byed mi dmigs/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/'du byed nyid kyang mi dmigs na/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la
36b1('bum): rnam par shes pa d+mo dmigs/rnam par shes pa'i ra btsun nyid mi dmigs te/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang med mogs na/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la
36b2('bum): 'gyur/de la myig myi dmigs/mig gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/mig nyid kyang mi dmigs na/mig gi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la rna ba mi dmigs
36b3('bum): rna ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rna ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rna ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la gyur/de la sna mi dmigs/sna'i dri bzhin nyid kyi dmigs
36b4('bum): sna nyid kyang mi dmigs na/sna'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par gal 'gyur/de la lce mi dmigs/lce'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ nyid kya mi dmigs ma
36b5('bum): de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par grwa li 'gyur/de la lus mi dmigs/lus kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/lus ni rgyung mi dmigs na/lus kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs
36b6('bum): par gal 'gyur/de la yid mi dmigs/yid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/yid nyid kyang mi dmigs na/yid d+hI de bzhin nyin du dmigs par bral 'gyur/de lta
36b7('bum): gzugs mi dmigs/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/gzugs nyid kyang ming migs na/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyi de lta mizhes par gal 'gyur/de la sgyu
37a1('bum): dmanas/ nanan da ma ma das te/nya kyang mang mogasan/rtswarang mazhan nyid lnga dmigs par gal 'gyur/ la d+hI mi dri migs/
37a2('bum): de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/dri nyid kyang mi dmigs na/dro'o de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la ro mi dmigs/'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/
37a3('bum): ro nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ro'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la reg mi dmigs/rnyog gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rab nyid kyang mi dmigs
37a4('bum): na/red bri de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la chos mi dmigs/chos kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/chos nyid kyang mi dmigs na/chos kyi de bzhin
37a5('bum): nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/mig bri rnam par shes pa
37a6('bum): nyid kyang mi dmyigs na/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/rna ba'i rnam par shes
37a7('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmibs par ga la 'gyur/de la sna
37b1('bum): rnam par shes pa maud migs/ rlo byung rnam pa da pazhin stod ma dmigs te/ rnam par nas byu rlom basmras skye rnam pa na 'o /
37b2('bum): ltung migs par ba la 'gyur/ la lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs lce'o rnam pa shes pa'i de 'din nyid mi dmigs te/'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myong sa
37b3('bum): ni/lce'i rnam par shes de'i de bzhin nyid lce dmigs par gal 'gyur/de la skyes kyi rnam par shes bya mi dmigasalus kyi rnam par shes pa'i nga zhon nyid snyi mags
37b4('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ba lnga 'gyur/de la srid kyi rnam par she rdzo ba mi tshig
37b5('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa da banan nyid mi dmags te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyi sang mi dmi smras na/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs pa
37b6('bum): la 'gyur/de la mib gi 'dus te rnyeb pa mi dmigs/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/mig de 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang ma da migs na/
37b7('bum): 'dus te ras pa'i de bzhin nyid lce dmigs par gal 'gyur/delan pa'i 'dus kyi reg tha mi dmigs rno ba'i 'dus kyi ba pa ra mnan nyid mi dmigs te/na pa'i
38a1('bum): te reg pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs/sna'i 'dus//
38a2('bum): te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la lce'i 'dus
38a3('bum): te reg pa mi dmigs/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/lha'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs
38a4('bum): par grwa la 'gyur/de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na//
38a5('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lto dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/
38a6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la ma gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba/
38a7('bum): mi dmigs/mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/mig gi
38b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs/rna ba'i 'dus te rlog pa las byung
38b2('bum): ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta
38b3('bum): dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/sna'i 'dus
38b4('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la lce'i 'dus te rig pa
38b5('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/lce'i
38b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par gA la 'gyur/de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
38b7('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs ni/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de
39a1('bum): dushin+da nyid /dmyigs rAg la 'byung yang k+Shu du t+te ga pa las byung 'tsho rang mi dmigs/yid ce su te rig pa las rgyu
39a2('bum): bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshur ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par
39a3('bum): ga la 'gyur/de la sa'i khams mi dmigs/sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/sa'i khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lha dmigs/
39a4('bum): par ga la 'gyur/de la chu'i khams mi dme des/chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/chu'i khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/chu'i khams kyi de bzhin ny-ide lta
39a5('bum): dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la me'i khams mi dmigs/me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/me'i khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/me'i khams kyi de bzhin
39a6('bum): nyid lta dmigs par grwa la 'gyur/de la rlung gi khams mi dmigs/rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rlung gi khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rlung gi khams
39a7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la nam mkha'i khams mo dmigs/nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/nam mkha'i khams nyid
39b1('bum): kyang mi dmigs na/nam 'a rnams kyid bzhin nyid ltar mi smras par ga la 'gyur//de la rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin
39b2('bum): nyid mi dmigs te/rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rnam par shes pa'i khyams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la ma rig pa mi
39b3('bum): dmigs/ma rigro pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ma rig pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la 'du byed mi dmigs /
39b4('bum): 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/'du byed nyid kyang mi dmigs na/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/
39b5('bum): rnam por shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs pa ga la 'gyur/de la ming
39b6('bum): dang gzugs mi dmigs/ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ming dang gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ming brang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs
39b7('bum): par ga la 'gyur/de la skye mched drug mo dmigs/skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/skye mched drug nyid kyang mi dmigs na/skye mched drug gi de bzhin
40a1('bum): nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la reg pa mi dmigs/reg pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rnyog pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/reg pa'i de bzhin
40a2('bum): nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la tshor ba mi dmigs/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/tshor ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs///
40a3('bum): par ga la 'gyur/de la sred pa mi dmigs/sred pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/sred pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/sred pa'i dri bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur//
40a4('bum): de la len pa mi dmigs/len pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/len pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/len pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la srid pa mi
40a5('bum): dmigs/srid pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/sred pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/srid pa'i de bzhin nyid lha dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la skye ba mi dmigs/skye ba'i
40a6('bum): de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/skye ba nyid kyang ma dmigs na/skye ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la rga shi mi dmigs/rga shi'o de bzhin nyid mi dmigs/
40a7('bum): te/rga shi nyid kyang mi dmigs ni/rga shi'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de
40b1('bum): bzhin nyid mi migs te/sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigasan/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par grwa la 'gyur/de la tshul khrims kyi/
40b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/tshul khrims kyi pha
40b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/bzod
40b4('bum): nga'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs
40b5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin
40b6('bum): nyid lta dmigs pa rA ga la 'gyur/de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/bsam gtan
40b7('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs//
41a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid
41a2('bum): dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la nang stong pa nyid mi dam gris/nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
41a3('bum): nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs/phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/phyi stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/phyi stong pa nyid kyi de
41a4('bum): bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ge la 'gyur/de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na//
41a5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par gau la 'gyur/de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/stong pa nyidi
41a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs pa drug la 'gyur/de la chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs/chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
41a7('bum): mi dmigs te/chen po stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/don dam
41b1('bum): bstong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par grwa la 'gyur/de la 'dus byas stong
41b2('bum): pa nyid mi dmigs/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga
41b3('bum): la 'gyur/de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/'dus ma
41b4('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/mtha' los 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs
41b5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
41b6('bum): mi dmigs/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/thog ma dang tha ma meng pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
41b7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/dor ba med pa stong
42a1('bum): pa nyid kya maud dmyigs na/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de lta rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs/rang bzhin/
42a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mi dmyigs na/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la chos
42a3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/chos thams cad stong pa nyid
42a4('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rang gi mtshan nyid
42a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/mi dmigs pa
42a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ba la 'gyur/de la
42a7('bum): dngos pa med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/dngos po med pa stong pa
42b1('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par gal 'gyuraro//de la dzin nyid stong pa nyid mo dmigs stong pa da tshun nyid po dmigs te/ bya nyid stong pa nyid kyu mi dmigs na/
42b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi
42b3('bum): dmigs te/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lha dmigs par grwa la 'gyur/de la dran pa nye bar
42b4('bum): bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs/dran pa nyi bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi dri bani
42b5('bum): nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur//de la yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs/yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/yang dag par sbyong ba nyid kyang mi dmigs/
42b6('bum): /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/
42b7('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la dbang 'i rnams mi dmigs/dbang po'i de bzhin nyid mi//
43a1('bum): dmigs te/dbang po nyid kyang mi dmigs na/dbang po rnams kyang bzhin nyid lha dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la stos rnams mi dmigs/stobs kyang brtan
43a2('bum): nyid mi dmigs te/stobs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs/byang chub
43a3('bum): kyi yan lag gi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang mi dmigs na/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la
43a4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang mi
43a5('bum): dmigs na/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs/'phags pa'i bden
43a6('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid mo dmigs te/'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/'phags pa'i badren pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par grwa la 'gyur/de la bsam gtan
43a7('bum): rnams mi dmigs/bsam gtan gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/bsam gtan nyid kyang mi dmigs na/bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la
43b1('bum): 'gyur/de la tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs/tshad med pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/tshad med pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs
43b2('bum): par ga la 'gyur/de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/gzugs med pa'i
43b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par gru la 'gyur/de la rnam par thar pa rnams mi
43b4('bum): dmigs/rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rnam par thar pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de
43b5('bum): la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/mthar gyis gnas pa'i
43b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo/
43b7('bum): stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mi dmigs/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'o de bzhin nyid mi
44a1('bum): nags te/ma nga bar bdu nyid dang / da pa dang snod mang dang migs ma/rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang mtshan
44a2('bum): ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/dri la mngon pa'i shes pa rnams mi dmigs/mngon par shes pa'i de zanan nyid mi dmigs
44a3('bum): te/mngon pa'i shes pa nyid kyang ri dmigs na/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par grwa la 'gyur/de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs/ti
44a4('bum): nge 'dzin gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmyigs te/ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang ba dmigs na/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par grol 'gyur/de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams
44a5('bum): mi dmigs/gargyas kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/gzungs kyi sgo 'du kyang mi dra bis nA/klu zungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/
44a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs nyid kyang mI dmigs na/
44a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par gal 'gyur/de la mo 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs/mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bzhin nyid mi dmigs
44b1('bum): te/mi 'jigs pa nyid nyung mid rdzogs na/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs/so sa yang /
44b2('bum): dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ma demigs te/so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ba la///
44b3('bum): 'gyur/de la byams pa chen po mi dmigs/byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/byams pa chen po nyid kyang myi dmigs na/byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid lta
44b4('bum): dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la snying rje chen po mi dmigs/snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/snying rje chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na//snying rje chen po'i de bzhin
44b5('bum): nyid lta dmigs par grol 'gyur/de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris de'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/sangs rgyas kyi chos//
44b6('bum): ma 'dres pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lha dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs//
44b7('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs
45a1('bum): par ga la 'gyur/de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/lan cig phyir/
45a2('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigaso//
45a3('bum): phyir mi 'o ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par
45a4('bum): gau la 'gyur/de la dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/dgra bcom pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/dgra bcom pa nyid
45a5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid lha dra migs par gra la 'gyur/de la rang byang chub mi dmigs/rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rang byang chub nyid kyang mi dmigs na/
45a6('bum): rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi dbazhin nyid mi dmigs te/
45a7('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
45b1('bum): dmigs/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rnam pa thams cad mabyon pa nyid kyang mo dmigs na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
45b2('bum): bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya'o//bam po nyis brgya so gcig pa//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid
45b3('bum): dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe/dge slong nyis brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par spel
45b4('bum): lo//dge slong ma lnga brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med ci'i dri ma dang bral ba skyes so//byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang /lha dang mi rnams kyis mi skye ba'i chos
45b5('bum): la bzod pa rab tu thob bo//byang chub sems dpa' yongs su nyams pa'i chos can drug cu ni nye ba ro len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu
45b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gis ni sangs rgyas lnga brgya bsnyen bkur te/thams cad du'ang sbyin pa byin/tshul khrims bsrungs/bzod pa bsgoms
45b7('bum): brtson 'grus brtsams/bsam gtan bsgrubs/shes rab bsgoms kyang /de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin papo yongs su ma bzung zhing /thebs mkhas pas yongs
46a1('bum): sum bzung bas/sbyin pa byin te/'don sbyin pa'o//'di la bdag gis sbyin par bya'o//'di ni tshul khrims so//bdag gis ni bsrung bar bya'o//'ang
46a2('bum): ni bzod pa'o//bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o//'di ni brtson 'brus so//bdag gis ni brnam par bya'o//'di ni bsam gtan no//bdag gis ni mnyam por bzhag
46a3('bum): par bya'o//'di ni shes rab bo//bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o//zhes tha dad par spyod pas/de dag shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing /thabs mkhas pas yongs
46a4('bum): su mi bzung bar sbyin pa gtong /tshul khrims srung /bzod pa sgrom/brtson 'grus rtsom/bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog/shes rab sgom par byed cing /de dag
46a5('bum): 'du shes sna tshogs kyis spyod pas/tha mi dad pa ma dmigs pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs so//de dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par
46a6('bum): ma gugs pas/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob/dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo//shrI ra dwa ti'i bu
46a7('bum): byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam stong pa nyid dam/mtshan ma med pa'am/smon pa med pa yod mod kyi/de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
46b1('bum): pa dang bral khrong /thangs bsrangs yongs su ma bzung na/yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas nas/nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom
46b2('bum): ldan 'das ci'i slad du stong pa nyid dang /mtshon ma mo mchis pa dang /smon pa ma mchis po'i chos de dag nyid la skom du 'dra'ang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral
46b3('bum): zhing /thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba rnams ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du bgyis shing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur la/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
46b4('bum): dpa' thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dag ni stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la sgom du bas kyang thobs mkhas pa la
46b5('bum): brten cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la kha
46b6('bum): cig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang bral ba/stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smyon pa med pa'i chos 'ba' shig sgom pa ni thabs mkhas pa mi thab pas/
46b7('bum): nyan thos pang rang sangs rgyaso dag tu 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba
47a1('bum): nadang /nas rjod padang /spyod pa yang mas ma nang/ma tshus sa sa sa/
47a2('bum): par 'jug cing /drin med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mdzin par rdzogs pad+ma cha tu'i bu 'di lta zhig la
47a3('bum): brgya ba ma/da pa che nyis brgyu pa 'am/dpag chad sbom paN+DI ba ma/dpag rlung bani brgya pa'am/dpas tshad la brgya pa zhig yod la/ngo sum cu na gas
47a4('bum): lha'i ris nas 'dir 'ang shA 'dadu la/byad la 'dang ma med pazhig ste/de dam+me'i gling du gnas so s+thA m+b+ha na k+She/sumats+tsha n+ta kasum 'i nas bang ga nyid mi
47a5('bum): shU ra tI'i dri de 'ji smras semaso/de la d+hI Sh+T+rI la sbyin sa ma la bdag gis skyes na kyi sa gnas gA'i skyes m+b+ha sa na/
47a6('bum): del ji sa dros sa byas byi sma tsun gtsun gyi na'i ris su gnas par nus 'am/dasal pam ldan 'das de ltam lags so// lda 'a
47a7('bum): chen po 'dren rgyal bangs kyi rlogs kya mi smras ma sdud pa cu'i gling du pa / dzu
47b1('bum): na shu ba byu /da /sa ldan sa /gsaso//samaldan gyu nga du srung na/
47b2('bum): mchi ba ni/de star myur du kAdon mi 'tshal lo//bas ldani 'das kyis bka' stsa pa/'idru bani du byang chub sems dpe dzinal po gang+gA da /
47b3('bum): khyim snyed du snyan pa gti na rdu la khrims srung /brjod pa sgom/brtson 'grus tsam/bis danatarnaM la mnya ma byed gni ga tsong /bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i phyi/
47b4('bum): mngon pa rdzogs pa rgyu de'i sgyu sa su 'dzin du rgyu med du na du/shes rab
47b5('bum): na pa dang bral zhing babs mkhas pas yong su sgrom bzung na/nyan thos kyis 'am/sangs rgyas kyi ma bcu nga //de ci'i phyir ni re/de ni 'di ltar byang chub ma
47b6('bum): 'i dris/rnam pa thams cad subyed pa nyid kyis sa dzi mi ldan pa spyan la pani sa rgya sa /
48a1('bum): bsgrubs pas/byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing /thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir/nyan thos kyis
48a2('bum): 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'odas pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul
48a3('bum): khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa sems shing /'dzin la mtshan mar byed kyang /de bzhin
48a4('bum): gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims mi shes/ting nge 'dzin mi shes/shes rab mi shes/rnam par grol ba mi shes/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mi shes na/de
48a5('bum): mi shes khong du ma chud pas stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i sgra thos nas/de ni de dag la zhi bar mtshan mar 'dzin te/des de dag la zhi bar
48a6('bum): mtshan mar bzung zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsgo'o//de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
48a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thobs mkhas pa dang bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na
48b1('bum): nod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni de ltar 'gyur du gdon mo za'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma sems
48b2('bum): bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang mi bral bar sbyin pa gtong zhing /tshul khrims srung ba dang /bzod pa sgrub pa dang /brtson 'grus rtsom
48b3('bum): pa dang /bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thobs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba ste/'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /dwa ltar byung
48b4('bum): ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa de
48b5('bum): la mtshan mar mi byed de/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin de la mtshan mar mi 'dzin/mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mtshan mar mi 'dzin/smon pa med pa'i ting
48b6('bum): 'dzin la mtshan mor mi 'dzin na/shA ra dwa tI'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi 'gyur
48b7('bum): bar rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des thog ma sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/sbyin pa byin
49a1('bum): yang mtshon mar ma bzung /tshul khrims bsrungs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /bzod pa bsgrubs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /brtson 'grus brtsams kyang
49a2('bum): mtshan mar ma bzung /bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /shes rab bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung /'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /
49a3('bum): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
49a4('bum): gzigs pa mtshan mar ma bzung /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung ngo //shA radwa tiSh+Tha
49a5('bum): bu de ltar mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims srung ba dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i
49a6('bum): sems kyis bzod pa sgrub pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bsam gtan la mnyam par
49a7('bum): gzhog pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis nang stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba
49b1('bum): sems kyis phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa//
49b2('bum): dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral
49b3('bum): ba'i sems kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis
49b4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis
49b5('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis chos thams cad stong
49b6('bum): pa nyid sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa
49b7('bum): dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral
50a1('bum): nga'i sems kyis dngos po med pa ba nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sgom pa dang /mtshan//
50a2('bum): ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral
50a3('bum): ba'i sems kyis dbang po rnams sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis stobs rnams sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
50a4('bum): sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
50a5('bum): sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bsam gtan rnams sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshad med pa rnams sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang
50a6('bum): bral ba'i sems kyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rnam par thar pa rnams sgom pa dang /mtshan
50a7('bum): ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
50b1('bum): nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mngon par shes pa rnams sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems
50b2('bum): kyis ting nge 'dzin rnams sdom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
50b3('bum): stobs rnams sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
50b4('bum): skam pa dang /mtshanA ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis snying rje chen po sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang /mtshan ma
50b5('bum): dang bral ba'i sems kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rlom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems
50b6('bum): kyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras budu sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dgra bcom pa nyid sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rang byang chub sgom pa dang //
50b7('bum): mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgom pa dang /mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom pa 'di ni/byang chu
51a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba
51a2('bum): ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral na/de'i/
51a3('bum): bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom ma mchis so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
51a4('bum): po des sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /gang mngon par
51a5('bum): rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bgyi ba'i gzugs sam/tshor ba'am/'du shes sam/'du byed dam/rnam par shes pa'am/mig gam/rna ba 'am/sna 'am/lce 'am/
51a6('bum): lus sam/yid dam/gzugs sam/sgra 'am/dri'am/ro 'am/reg gam/chos sum/mig gi rnam par shes pa 'am/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/sna'i
51a7('bum): rnam par shes pa'am/lce'i rnam par shes pa'am/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am/yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/mig gi 'dus te rig pa'am/rna ba'i 'dus
51b1('bum): te reg pa'am/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'am/lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'am/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher
51b2('bum): ba'am/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'am/lus kyi 'dus
51b3('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa lngas byung ba'i tshor ba 'am/sa'i khams sam/chu'i khams sam/me'i khams sam/rlung gi khams sam//
51b4('bum): nam mkha'i khams sam/rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ma rog pa'am/'du byed dam/rnam par shes pa'am/ming dang gzugs sam/skye mched drug gam/
51b5('bum): reg pa 'am/tshor ba 'am/srid pa 'am/len pa'am/sbrid pa 'am/skye ba 'am/rga shi 'am/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/
51b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/nang stong pa nyid dam/phyi
51b7('bum): stong pa nyid dam/phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/chen po stong pa nyid dam/don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/'odus ma byas
52a1('bum): stong pa nyid dam/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/thog ma dang tha ma meng pa stong pa nyid dam/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/rang bzhin stong pa
52a2('bum): nyid dam/chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dam/ngo bo nyid stong pa
52a3('bum): nyid dam/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/
52a4('bum): dbang po rnams sam/stobs rnams sam/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/
52a5('bum): bsam gtan rnams sam/tshad med pa rnams sam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa rnams sam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i
52a6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa 'am/mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ting nge
52a7('bum): 'dzin rnams sam/gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam//
52b1('bum): byams pa chen po 'am/snying rje chen po 'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi//
52b2('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid dam/rang byang chub dam/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/chos gang yang dmigs
52b3('bum): pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo bang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang bral
52b4('bum): ba de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom mchis par rig par bgyi ba ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems
52b5('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sbyin pa ci dang ci btang ba de thams cad mtshan mar bzung ste btang /de bzhin du tshul khrims gang dang gang bsrungs
52b6('bum): pa dang /bzod pa ci dang ci bsgrubs pa dang /brtson 'grus gang dang gang brtsams pa dang /bsam gtan gang dang gang la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /shes rab gang
52b7('bum): dang gang bsgoms pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar bzung ste bsgoms pas/de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bla na
53a1('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub na tha tshom mchis par rig par bgyu'o//bcom ldan 'das de slang du byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang 'anan/
53a2('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dong thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bar rig
53a3('bum): par bgyi'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa la gnas te/mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtang
53a4('bum): bar bgyi'o//tshul khrims bsrung bar bgyi'o//bzod pa bsgrub par bgyi'o//brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi'o//bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag par bgyi'o//
53a5('bum): shes rab bsgom par bgyi'o//nang stong pa nyid la spyad par drigyi'o//phyi stong pa nyid la spyod par bgyi'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o//stong pa nyid stong pa
53a6('bum): nyid la spyad par bgyi'o//chen po stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o//don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o//'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o//'dus
53a7('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o//mtha' los 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o//thog ma dang tha ma med po stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o//dor ba med
53b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o//rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o//chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyad par dgyi'o//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par
53b2('bum): bgyi'o//mI dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
53b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyad par brgya'o//yang dag par sbyang ba rnams la spyad par bgyi'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la
53b4('bum): spyad par bgyi'o//dbang po rnams la spyad par bgyi'o//stobs rnams la spyad par bgyi'o//byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyad par bgyi'o//'phags pa'i lam
53b5('bum): yon lag brgyad pa la smad bar bgyi'o//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la skyed par 'gyir//chos ma gtan rnams la spyad par mgyi'o//tshad med pa rnams la spyad pa
53b6('bum): bgyi'o//gzugs med bya snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o//rnam par thar pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o//mthur gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
53b7('bum): pa rnams la skyed par 'gyi'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la spyad par bgyi'o//mngon par shes pa rnams
54a1('bum): spyad par brgya'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyad par brgya'o//gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad par brgya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyang
54a2('bum): par bgyi'o//mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o//so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o//byams pa chen po la spyad par bgyi'o//snying rje chen
54a3('bum): po la spyad par bgyi'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyad par bgyi'o//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la
54a4('bum): spyad par bgyi'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyad par bgyi'o//dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod par bgyi'o//rang byang chub la spyad par bgyi'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
54a5('bum): nyid la spyad par bgyi'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyad par bgyi'o//de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom
54a6('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
54a7('bum): bgyid la/chos de dag kyang ma mchis shing mi dmigs pas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
54b1('bum): stsal pa/lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/lha'i bu dag bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'byung bar dka'o//lha'i bu dag ngas kyang chos thams cad rnam pa
54b2('bum): thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/don dam par na gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya ba 'am/gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/gang
54b3('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha'i bu dag chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//de nas tshe dang
54b4('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub ni 'byung bar
54b5('bum): dka'o zhes gsungs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba dang /bdag sems pa ltar na bcom ldan 'das bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs
54b6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ni mi dka'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu ba ma
54b7('bum): mchis/gang gis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis/dang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'ang ma mchis te/chos thams cad ni stong pa/
55a1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa la nI gang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyu ba dang /gang grus mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /gang mngon par rdzogs
55a2('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu ma mchis so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/chos gang yang 'phel bar bgyi
55a3('bum): nga'i slad du 'am/yongs su 'grib par bgyi ba'i slad du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba 'am/tshul khrims srung ba 'am/bzod pa bsgom pa'am/brtson 'grus rtsom pa'am/
55a4('bum): bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag pa'am/shes rab bsgom pa 'am/nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am//
55a5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'amo/'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/'dus ma byas stong
55a6('bum): pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/thog ma dang bla ma med bu stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'o ma/rang
55a7('bum): bzhini stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa'am/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/
55b1('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa 'am/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/
55b2('bum): yang dag par stong ba rnams bsgom pa 'am/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa'am/dbang po rnams bsgom pa 'am/stobs rnams bsgom pa 'am/byang chub kyi yan lag
55b3('bum): rnams bsgom pa 'am/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po bsgom pa 'am/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa'am/tshad
55b4('bum): med pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
55b5('bum): 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa'am/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa bsgom pa 'am/mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/
55b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa'am/gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa 'am/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom pa 'am/mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/so so
55b7('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/byams pa chen po bsgom pa 'am/snying rje chen po bsgom pa 'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa 'am/rgyun
56a1('bum): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa 'am/dgra bcom pa rnyahA/
56a2('bum): bsgom pa'am/rang byang chub bsgom pa 'ape/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa'am/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du bslab pa'i chos de dag kyang ma mchis
56a3('bum): pa ste/gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de dag thams
56a4('bum): cad kyang stong pa ste/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
56a5('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzu pa ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis snang ngo //char ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis
56a6('bum): sbyong ngo //'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhini gyis stong ngo //'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gyis snang ngo //rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis
56a7('bum): ste/mig ni mig de rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rna ba ni rna ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //sna ni sna'i rang bzhin gyis snang ngo //lci ni lce'i rang bzhin gyis stong
56b1('bum): //lus ni lus kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //yad ni yod kyi rang bzhin myos stong ngo //bzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //sgra ni sgra'i rang bzhin gyis
56b2('bum): stong ngo //drin dri'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //ro ni ro'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //reb ni reg go rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //chos ni chos kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //mig
56b3('bum): gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis snang ngo //rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rno ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis sbyang ngo //sna'i rnam par
56b4('bum): shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus
56b5('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi
56b6('bum): 'jus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang
56b7('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo //lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'jus te re ge pa'i rang bzhin gyis sto
57a1('bum): do//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //mig go 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las
57a2('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba'i ras bzhin gyis stong ngo //rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //sna'i 'dus
57a3('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byang ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa
57a4('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //yid
57a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa lasu byung po'i tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
57a6('bum): chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //me'i khams ni me'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong
57a7('bum): ngongo//nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin byis snang //
57b1('bum): ma rig pa ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pang rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //mang
57b2('bum): dang gzugs ni ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //reg pa ni reg pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
57b3('bum): tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //sred pa ni sred pa'i ra ngo bzhin gyis stong ngo //len pa ni len pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //srid pa ni srid pa'i rang bzhin gyis
57b4('bum): stong ngo //skye ba ni skye ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rga shi ni rga shi'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis
57b5('bum): stong ngo //tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin po ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin
57b6('bum): byis stong ngo //brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol
57b7('bum): tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang
58a1('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo //phyi stong pa nyid rdo rgya stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //stong pa nyid
58a2('bum): stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong
58a3('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong
58a4('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
58a5('bum): ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rang bzhin stong pa
58a6('bum): nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
58a7('bum): nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
58b1('bum): ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos/
58b2('bum): bro med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //yang dag par spong ba rnams
58b3('bum): ni yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i reng bzhin gyis stong ngo //dbang po rnams ni dbang po'i rang bzhin gyis
58b4('bum): stong ngo //stobs rnams ni stobs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //'phags pa'i lam
58b5('bum): yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phagasra pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //'phags pa'i badren pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong
58b6('bum): ngo //bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
58b7('bum): pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //mthar gyis
59a1('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
59a2('bum): dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo skyod pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //mngon
59a3('bum): par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs
59a4('bum): kyi sgo'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi
59a5('bum): 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen//
59a6('bum): rang bzhin gyis byung ngo //snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang
59a7('bum): bzhin gyis stong //rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //len cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong
59b1('bum): ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni byar mo 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang //
59b2('bum): bzhin gyis rnyeng ngo //rang byang chub ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //rnam pa thams/
59b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//
59b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan
59b5('bum): pa rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar nam mkha' ni 'di snyam du bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so//
59b6('bum): tshe dang ljon pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang 'di snyam du bdag gis/debla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
59b7('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bor bya'o snyam du mi sems so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nga ni 'di ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/'on kyang byang chub sems dpa'
60a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad nam mnga' lta bur mos nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
60a2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur mos par byed kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
60a3('bum): rdzogs por 'tshang rgya bar smra ste/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba med na ni/byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs
60a4('bum): pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par yang mi 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam grangs ngas na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
60a5('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar ni dka' ba ste/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sla bo ma yin par shes so//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ljon pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam
60a6('bum): du sems/gzugs bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/smras pa tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//smras pa 'o na ci tshor ba bla na
60a7('bum): mid pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//smras pa 'o na ci 'du shes bla na med pa yang dag par
60b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//smras pa 'o na ci 'du byed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog
60b2('bum): gam/smras pa che dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//smras pa 'o na ci rnam par shes pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lngas ldog gom/smras pa che dang /
60b3('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/de ji snyam du sems/mig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/
60b4('bum): smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//smras pa 'o na ci rna ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/smyos bre tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
60b5('bum): de ni ma yin no//smras pa 'o na ci sna bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//smras pa 'on ci
60b6('bum): lce bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/smras pa che dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//smras pa 'o na ci lus bla na med pa yang dag par
60b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/smos pa che dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//smras pa 'o na ci yid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog
61a1('bum): nam/sgru patsha dang ldan pa rab 'byor don ma yin no//smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sh+ma ra ta'i bu de ji snyam du sems dazugs blan mod pa yang dag par rjodas
61a2('bum): pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/smras pa tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//smras pa'o na ci smra bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/smras
61a3('bum): patshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//smras pa'o na ci dri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni mi
61a4('bum): yin no//smras pa'i no cor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldeg gam/rgyas po rgyu dang ldan par bya 'byor de ni ma yin no//smras pa'i na ci rog bla na med
61a5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni mi yin no//skyes pa 'o na ci chos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
61a6('bum): chub las ldog dam/smras po tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/mig gi rnam par shes pa bla na med
61a7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/smras pa cha dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//smras pa'o na ci rna ba'i rnam par shes pa blan med pa yang dag

75b5('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las gud na gang blan mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmigs sam/smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma
75b6('bum): yin no//smras pa 'o na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na gang blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de lta bu dmigs sam/smras
75b7('bum): pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//smras pa 'on phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud nu gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldeg pa

76a6('bum): dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ji snyam du sems/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
76a7('bum): pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid
76b1('bum): glang yin pa de bla na med pa yang da tur rtogs pa byang chub las rdzob gas/'du spyong kyad brtson nyid dang yon pad+mo thun mong pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
76b2('bum): rdzog gas/rnam dur shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gong yin pa de d+ha ni med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pam/smras pa rgya dang ldan pa rang 'byor de ni ma
76b3('bum): yin no//sgras g+h+nA n+d+he dang ldan pa shA radwa dI'i bu de ci snyam du se mas/mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin padu rgyu ni sridang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chutsho las rdzog
76b4('bum): sa/rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na ma du yid drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na medo pa yang dag pa
76b5('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/lus kyi de bzhin
76b6('bum): gang yin pa de bla na med de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa da d+hA ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
76b7('bum): las ldog pas/spros patshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor don ma yin no//sgras pa che dang ldan pa shA rang tu'i bu de ji snyam du sems/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang na
77a1('bum): pad rgyun meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las drug gas/nga bzhin to gang yin pa de rgyun myong du yang dag par rdzogs pa byung chu
77a2('bum): las ldog gas/dri de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na ma nga yang rnyed par rdzogs de'i byung tshub las ldog gam/ro'i dri bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla med pa
77a3('bum): yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/reg bri de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/chos kyi
77a4('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de blon med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/smras pa che dang ldan pa rab 'byur de ni ma yin no//skyes pa tshe dang ldan pa
77a5('bum): rang ti 'bri ji snyan dusams/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de skyon nyi gang yin pa de blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la su ga gam/rna ba'i rnam
77a6('bum): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog sum/snreng rnam par shes po 'di bzhin nyid deng yin pa de bla na med par
77a7('bum): dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldeg gam/sgra'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog ga ma/
77b1('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog gam/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin/

78a1('bum): byang du nan nyid gang yon du rgyun mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog nam/rna ba'i 'dus te rnyog pa lnga byung ba'i rgyur dwa'i de bzhin
