190b7('bum): thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug cing /bla na med po yang dog par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
191a1('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba zhig
191a2('bum): bskal pa dAng+ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug cing 'tsho ste/sbyin pa byi ni/tshul khrimos bsrungs/bzod pa bsgrubs/brtson 'grus brtsams/bsam gtan la mnyam par
191a3('bum): bzhag/shes rab bsgoms na/de'i bsod nams de'i rgyu so mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom
191a4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas te/nyi ma 'ga' zhig sbyin
191a5('bum): pa byin pa dang /tshul khrims bsrungs po dang /bzod pa bsgrubs pa dang /brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /bsam gau tan la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /shes rob
191a6('bum): bsgoms pa de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches
191a7('bum): po rnams kyi ma'o//'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bskyed pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
191b1('bum): la gnas nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du
191b2('bum): mngangon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bas bskal pa
191b3('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas te/chos kyi smyon pa byin na/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang
191b4('bum): ngo/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
191b5('bum): 'di las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du gnas te/nyi ma 'ga' zhig chos kyi sbyin pa byin na/de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byoro de ni 'di
191b6('bum): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po dang bral ba de ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang bral ba'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems/
191b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral ba ste/rab 'byor de bas na byang chubo sems
192a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na meng du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma
192a2('bum): bral bar bya'o//rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
192a3('bum): du gnas te/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag
192a4('bum): bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
192a5('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
192a6('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la brtson par byed na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom
192a7('bum): ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
192b1('bum): kyi rol tu phyin pa zlan mo 'di la sa'i skad du bstan pa bzhin duganas te/nyim 'ag shig dran pa myur bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bcu dang /
192b2('bum): pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs sde dang /byang chub rgyu yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag bskyed pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bani dang /bas
192b3('bum): gtan bzhi dang /tshad mid pa byin dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ze bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
192b4('bum): dgu dang /rnam par tha pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smin pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzung
192b5('bum): sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byes bcu dang /mi 'jigs pazhin dang /so sa yang dag par rig pA bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po
192b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la brtson par byed na/de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel mo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' rkyen
192b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba//rnam pasems cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir ldog pa de ni gnas med gobs med do de ni gnas ma yin no//rab 'byor 'ang
193a1('bum): ni gnas yin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir/
193a2('bum): ldog pa'i gnas yod do//rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar bya'o//rab 'byor de dzi//
193a3('bum): snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bas bskal pa gang+gA'i gling gi bye ma snyed du gnas te/zang zing gi sbyin pa
193a4('bum): de dang /chos kyi skyon pa de dang nang du yang dag par 'jog pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/rnyogs
193a5('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs po mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis
193a6('bum): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du gnas te/nyi ma 'ga'
193a7('bum): zhig zang zing gi sbyin po de dang /chos kyi sbyin pa de dang /nang du yang dag par 'jog pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
193b1('bum): chub tu yongs su bsngo na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su bsngo
193b2('bum): nga'adi ni bsngo ba'i mchog go//gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar yongs su bsngo ba de ni yongs su bsngo ba ma yin no//rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'
193b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su bsngo ba la
193b4('bum): mkhas par bya'o//rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang la las bskal po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas
193b5('bum): te/'das po dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed po de thams cad la
193b6('bum): rjes su yi rang nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol
193b7('bum): pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'amo rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
194a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la gnas te/nyi ma 'gra'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
194a2('bum): bsngos na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor bsngo ba thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni/shes rab kyi pha/
194a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o//rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
194a4('bum): bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas par bya'o//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mngon por 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa ni yongs su
194a5('bum): brtag pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal na/de la ji ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ba lags/bcom
194a6('bum): ldan 'das mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pas ni yang dag par lta ba bskyed pa'am/skyon ma mchis par yang 'jug par mi nus so//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
194a7('bum): 'thob pa'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'am phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa 'am/bla na med pa yang dag par
194b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang ma nur te/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/mngon par 'du
194b2('bum): bya ba med pa so ni/yang dag par lta ba bskyed pa'am/skyon med par 'jug pa'am/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa 'am/
194b3('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa 'am/ngogra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa 'am/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus te/
194b4('bum): rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa de'ang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ste/stong pa nyid du snang ngo //gsob
194b5('bum): nyid du snang ngo //gsog nyid du snang ngo //snying po med pa nyid du snang ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/nang stong pa
194b6('bum): nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o//phyi stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o//
194b7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o//don dam pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bsgrings pa'o//'dus byas stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
195a1('bum): la shin tu bslabs pa'o//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid lnga shin tu bslabs
195a2('bum): pa'o//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid lnga shin tu bslabs pa'o//rang bzhin stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o//chos thams cad stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o//
195a3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o//dngos po med pa stong po nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o//
195a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid snang ba nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni stong
195a5('bum): pa nyid de dag la gnas shing /ji lta ji ltar mngon par 'du bya ba med pa de dag la rab tu rtog pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
195a6('bum): tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur te/ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de lta de ltar grangs med
195a7('bum): dpag tu med chad med pa'i bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das grangs ma mchis pa dang /dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /tshad ma mchis
195b1('bum): pa la bye brag ni ci mchis/khyad par ni ci mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor grangs med pa zhes bya ba ni gang 'dus byas kyi khams sam/'dus ma byas kyi khams//
195b2('bum): su bgrang bar nye bar mi 'gro ba'o//rab 'byor dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba ni/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /de ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la tshad mi dmigs pa'o//rab 'byor chad
195b3('bum): med pa zhes bya ba ni gang gzhal bar mi nus pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs grang gis gzugs kyang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis por 'gyur
195b4('bum): ba de lta bu'i rnam grangs mchis sam/tshor ba'ang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /'du shes kyang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma
195b5('bum): mchis par 'gyur ba dang /'du byed kyang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /rnam par shes pa'ang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma
195b6('bum): mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis gzugs kyang grangs med dpag tu med tshad med
195b7('bum): par 'gyur ba dang /tshor ba'ang grangs med dpag tu med tshad med par 'gyur ba dang /'du shes kyang grangs med dpag tu med tshad med par 'gyur ba dang /'du byed kyang
196a1('bum): grangs med dpag tu med tshad med par 'gyur ba dang /rnam par shes pa'ang grangs med dpag tu med chad med par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu yod do//
196a2('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs gang gis na gzugs kyang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis ched ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags/tshor ba'ang grangs ma mchis
196a3('bum): dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags/'du shes kyang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags/'du byed kyang grangs ma
196a4('bum): mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags/rnam par shes pa'ang grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis tshad ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan
196a5('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs kyang stong pa ste/grangs med dpag tu med tshad med pa'o//tshor ba'ang stong pa ste/grangs med dpag tu med chad med pa'o//
196a6('bum): 'du shes kyang stong pa ste/grangs mod dpag tu med tshad med po'o//'du byed kyang stong pa ste/grangs med dpag tu med tshad med pa'o//rnam par shes pa'ang stong ba ste/grangs
196a7('bum): med dpag tu med tshad mod pa'o//gsal po/bcom ldan 'das gzugs 'ba' shig steng /tshor ba 'ba' shig steng /'du shes 'ba' shig slong /'du byed 'ab
196b1('bum): shig steng /rnam par shes pa 'ba' shig stong du bas kyi/ci chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes gsungs te/stong pa ma lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
196b2('bum): 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ngas chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes ma bshad dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes gsungs te//
196b3('bum): stong pa nyid gang lags pa de ni mi zad pa ste/grangs ma mchis pa'ang de lags/dpag tu ma mchis pa'ang de lags/tshad ma mchis pa'ang de lags te/bcom ldan 'das stong
196b4('bum): pa nyid la ni grangs kyang mi dmigs/dpag pa'ang mi dmigs/tshad kyang mi dmigs te/bcom ldan 'das de bas na chos de dag la don tam yi gos tha dad du bgyi ba mi dmigs
196b5('bum): so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin to/chos de dag la don tam yi ges tha dad du bya ba mi dmigs so//rab 'phyir mi zad pa
196b6('bum): zhes bya ba 'am/tshad med pa zhes bya ba 'am/stong pa zhes bya ba'am/mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba 'am/smon pa med pa zhes bya ba 'am/mngon par 'dra bya ba med pa zhes bya ba
196b7('bum): 'am/skye ba med pa zhes bya ba 'am/'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba'am/'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'am/mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'di ni brjod du med pa los
197a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pas brjod de/mi zad pa zhes bya ba 'am/tshad med pa zhes bya ba 'am/stong pa zhes bya ba 'am/mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba 'am/smon
197a2('bum): pa med pa zhes bya ba 'am/mngon par 'du bya ba med pa zhes bya ba 'am/skye ba med pa zhes bya ba 'am/'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba 'am/'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba
197a3('bum): 'am/mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa mngon par bsgrub par bshad pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos rnams kyi chos
197a4('bum): nyid de bzhini gshegs pas bstan pa la/chos nyid de'ang brjod du ma mchis pa ni ngo mtshar tshe'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'chal ba ltar
197a5('bum): na/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni brjod du ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor chos
197a6('bum): thams cad ni brjod du med pa'o//rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi brjod du med pa gang yin pa de na stong pa nyid de/stong pa nyid la ni brjod pa gang yang med do//stong pa
197a7('bum): nyid ni brjod par mi nus so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das brjod du ma mchis pa'i don la 'phel ba dang /yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das
197b1('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/rarba gyur brjod du med pa'i don la ni 'phel ba'am yongs su 'grib pa med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te brjod du
197b2('bum): ma mchis pa'i don la 'phel ba dang /yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis na/bcom ldan 'das des sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis par 'gyur
197b3('bum): ro//bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'phel ba dang /yongs su 'grib pa mo mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'
197b4('bum): 'phel ba dang yongs su 'gab pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rarol tu phyin pa'ang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//
197b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa mi mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'phel ba
197b6('bum): dang yochis su 'grib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das na stong ba nyid kyang 'phrul ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das phyi stong
197b7('bum): za nyid kyang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//
198a1('bum): com ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'phri ba ma mchis par 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das chen rdo stong pa nyid kyang 'phel ba
198a2('bum): dang yongs su 'grub pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das don dam pa snang ba nyid kyang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa me mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan
198a3('bum): 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pam mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang 'khyil ba dang yongs su 'grib
198a4('bum): ba ma mchis por 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das thog ma
198a5('bum): dngabu ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma
198a6('bum): mchis par //bcom ldan 'das rang bzhini stong pa nyid kyang 'phel ba dang mongs su 'brib ma mchis par 'gyur ro//com ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa
198a7('bum): nyid kyang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'greb pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan padas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshol ba dang mongs su 'grob pa ma mchis pa
198b1('bum): ro//bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'phel ba dang yongs
198b2('bum): su 'grib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo
198b3('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar bzhag po rnams kyang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma

198b5('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams kyang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams kyang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis par
198b6('bum): 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams kyang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang 'phel
198b7('bum): ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis par
199a1('bum): 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das bsam
199a2('bum): gtan rnams kyang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams kyang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis par
199a3('bum): 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang 'phel ba dang yongs su 'grib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das rnam
