260a4('bum): to can gyis mi ma yin par gyur po de ci nas kyang gud du 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan du byed de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/da na 'di ltar bdud sdig to can no mi ma yin pa de bas
260a5('bum): chos mthu dang ldan zhing /tshes gzi brjid dang ldan pas de'i phyir bdud sdig to can de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis mi ma yin pa de gud du song bar gyur pa la/byang chub sems
260a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di snyam ste/de ltar bdag gi mthus mi ma yin pa de gudo du song ngo snyam nas/bdud kyi mthus mi ma yin pa de gud du song par ni ma shes
260a7('bum): te/de de'i rgyus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la brnyas pa dang /'phya ba dang 'bring smad byed cing smod la khyad du gsod cing /bdag ni sngon gyi
260b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin gyi/'di dag gzhan
260b2('bum): ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to zhes nas/de de tsam gyis nga rgyal 'phel bar byed pa dang /nga rgyal bskyed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
260b3('bum): nyid ring du byed/bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ring du byed na/de ltar thabs mi mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni de tsam gyis lhag pa'i nga rgyal bskyed pas ngos su
260b4('bum): gnyis por 'gro ba rig par bya ste/'di ltar nyan thos kyi so 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o//de ltar na bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
260b5('bum): blo de'i bdud kyi las 'byung ste/dul de dge ba'i shes gnyen la mi snyan mi sten cing mi 'grogs la/bsnyen bkuro mi byed na/de nyid du bdud kyi bcings pa de dam por byed pa
260b6('bum): yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la ma spyad pa dang /thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir te/rab 'byor de lta bu'ang byang chub sems dpa'
260b7('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdudan kyi las su rig por bya'o//rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin po la ma spyad pa/
261a1('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad pa/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad pa/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad pa/bsam gtan gyi pha rol
261a2('bum): tu phyin pa las spyad pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad pa/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la ma spyad pa/yang dag par spong ba bzhi lo ma spyad pa/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
261a3('bum): pa bzhi la ma spyod pa/dbang po lnga la ma spyad pa/stobs lnga la ma spyad pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la ma spyad pa/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la ma spyad
261a4('bum): pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /sman pa med pa la ma spyad pa/skyon med par mi chud pa'i drung du bdud sdig to can ming gi byin gyi rlabs
261a5('bum): kyis nye bar 'ong ba yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la bdud sdig to can cha byad gang yang rung bas nye bar 'ongs shing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad du/
261a6('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ste/khyod
261a7('bum): kyi mang ni 'di zhes bya'o//khyod kyi pa'i ming ni 'di zhes bya'o//khyod kyi ma'i ming ni 'di zhes bya'o//khyod kyi phu nu'i ming ni 'di zhes bya'o//khyod kyi bu sring gi ming mi 'dzin
261b1('bum): bya'o//khyod kyi mdzo' bo dang blon po dang gnyen bshes kyi ming ni 'di zhes bya'o zhes bya ba nas/pha ma'i rabs bdun gyi bar du nye bar ston cing /khyod ni yul che ge mo zhig dang /khyod ni
261b2('bum): grong khyer cho ga mo zhig dang /khyod ni phyogs che ge mo zhig nas yul che ge mo zhig tu skyes so//grong che ge mo zhig tu skyes so//grong rdal che go mo zhig tu skyes so//gal te ngang
261b3('bum): gis 'ijam pa zhig yin na/de de la 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang 'di bzhin du 'jam por gyur to zhes zer/gal te rno ba zhig yin na/de de la 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang
261b4('bum): 'di bzhin du rno bar gyur to zhes zer/gal te dgon pa pa zhig yin na/de de la 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang dgon pa par gyur to zhes zer/gal te bsod snyoms pa zhig
261b5('bum): yin na/de de la 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang bsod snyoms par gyur to zhes zer/gal te phyag dar khrod pa zhig yin na/di de la 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang phyag dar
261b6('bum): khrod par gyur to zhes zer/gal te bsod snyoms phyis mi len po zhig yin na/de de la 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang bsod snyoms phyis mi len par gyur to zhes zer/
261b7('bum): zhal te stan gcig pa zhig yin na/de de la 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang stan gcig par gyur to zhes zer/gal te ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms pa zhig yin na/de de la
262a1('bum): 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms par gyur to zhes zer/gal te dur khrod pa zhig yin na/de de la 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang
262a2('bum): dur khrod par gyur te zhes zer/gal te bla gab med pa zhig yin na/de de la 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang bla gab med par gyur to zhes zer/gal te shing drung pa zhig
262a3('bum): yin na/de de 'dzod skad du khyod ni sngon yang shing drud par gyur te zhes zer/gal te cig pu ba zhig yin na/de de la 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang cog pu par gyur
262a4('bum): zhes zor/gal te gzhi ji bzhin pa zhig yin na/de de la 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang gzhi ji bzhin par gyur to zhes zer/gal te chos gos gsum pa zhig yin na//
262a5('bum): de de la 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang chos gos gsum par gyur te zhes zer/gal te 'dod pa chung ba zhig yin no/de de la 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang 'dod pa chung ba ra//
262a6('bum): gyur to zhes zer/gal te cho ga shes pa zhig yin na/de de la 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang tshig shes par gyur to zhes zer/gal te dben pa pa rke ge yin na/dang /
262a7('bum): lo 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang dben pa par gyur to zhes zer/gas te rkang pa bsku ba de'i bral ba zhig yin na/de de la 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang rkang pa bsdu 'dang bral
262b1('bum): bar gyur to zhes zer/gal te sgra de nyung ba zhig yin na/dede la 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang sgra ba nyung bar gyur to zhes dz+war/gal te 'jam pa nyung ba zhig yin na/de de la
262b2('bum): 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang 'bum pa nyung bar gyur to zhes zer/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar khyod la rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dag yod pa las na/gdon mi
262b3('bum): za bar sngon yang sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /sdom pa 'di dag dang ldan par ma gyur mi srid do zhes zer ba la/de de ltar sngon gyi ming dang rus bstan pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i
262b4('bum): sbyangs pa'i yon ton dang sdom pa bstan pas/rlom sems skyed pas de ltar bdud sdig te can de'i drung du nye bar 'ongs shing 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod ni de bzhin gshegs
262b5('bum): bo dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod la yon tan yod pa ci 'dra ba bzhin du/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
262b6('bum): lung bstan to zhes zer zhing /yang na dge slong gi cha byad du nye bar 'ong /yang na dge slong ma'i cha byad du nye bar 'ong /yang na khyim bdag gi tshe byad du nye bar 'ong/yang na
262b7('bum): pa'i tshe byed du nye bar 'ong /yang na ma'i cha byad du nye bor 'ong zhing /'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
263a1('bum): rnar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to//de ci'i phyi ba nA na/de 'di ltar khyod la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
263a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan gang ji snyed pa de dang yod do zhes zer la/rab 'byor ngas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
263a3('bum): rnam pa dang /tshul dang mtshan ma gang bshad pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la med ni/rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis byang chub
263a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gang phyir mi ldog
263a5('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa dang /tshul dang mtshan mo de dag kyang med la/ming bstan pa des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
263a6('bum): po gzhan la brnyas pa dang /'phya ba dang spyod pa byed cing khyad du gsod la snod na/rab 'byor 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming gi byin gyi rlabs kyis/
263a7('bum): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos meng gi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud kyi las su rig par bya ste/de
263b1('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor da ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug lnga ma spyad pas phung po'i bdud mi shes te/gzugs mi shes//
263b2('bum): tshor ba mi shes/'du shes mi shes/'du byed mi shes/rnam par shes pa mi shes pas de la bdud sdig to can ming gau byin gyi rlabs kyis lung ston cing /khyod ni
263b3('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ming 'di zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming
263b4('bum): gang bsams pa dang /dpyad pa de nyid brjod de/de la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab 'chal pa'i ngang tshul can thab sngo la mi mkhas pa de 'di snyam ste/bdag gis ming
263b5('bum): glang yid kyis rnam par brtags te/bsams pa dang rjes su dpyad pa de nyid bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i//
263b6('bum): ming du 'gyur ro snyam ste/ji lta ji ltar bdud sdig te can nam/bdud kyi ris kyi lha 'am/bdud kyi byin gyi rlobs pa'i dge slong dag ston pa de lce de ltar sems shing /ji
263b7('bum): ltar dedage gis sems bskyed pa dang /bdag gi ming ji lta ba bzhin du dge slong 'dis bstan te/ming dang ming du mthun gyis/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
264a1('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chul lung bstan to snyam nas/rab 'byor byang chub
264a2('bum): sems dpa' de la gung ngas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa dang tshul dang mtshan ma bshad pa de dag kyang med lo mid de dang lung
264a3('bum): bstan par brjod pa des kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la khyad du gsod na/de rlom sems des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
264a4('bum): bI'i byang chub las ring du 'gyur ro//de ltar thubs mkhas pa dang mi ldan lashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral te//
264a5('bum): sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su bzung ba de'i sa ni gnyis su rig par bya ste/'di ltar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o//yang na'adra shin tu yun ring por
264a6('bum): 'khor zhing 'phyan 'phyan nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen pa dang /bsten pa dang /rim gro byas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/bla/
264a7('bum): na med pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpas yang dang yang du dge
264b1('bum): bu'i bo shes gnyen blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bar ma gyur la/lus thob pa des sems bskyed pa snga ma dag mi smod mi 'chags na/dwe ni sa gnyis su 'gro bar rig par bya/
264b2('bum): ste/'di ltar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o//'di lta ste/dper na dge slong nyan thos kyi theg pa pas ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi las ltung ba gang yang rung ba gcig/
264b3('bum): byas na/dge sbyong ma yin shAkya'i bu ma yin par 'gyur te/de ni lus de nyid kyis dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi las dge sbyong gi 'bras bu gang yang rung ba la la 'thob par 'gyur
264b4('bum): ba'i skal ba med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ming bstan pa tsam gyis rlom sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed cing ming tsam brjod
264b5('bum): ba des byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la brnyas pa dang /'phya ba dang khyad du gsod pa'i sems skyed pa de ni de bas kyang shin tu lci ba ste/sems bskyed pa de ni de bas kyang shin
264b6('bum): tu lci bar reg par bya'o//rab 'byor de ltar ming bstan pas bdud kyi las shin tu phra ba de lta bu dag skye bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor ltung ba'i rtsa ba ba bzhi po lha zhog gi
264b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i ming bstan po tsam gyis rlom sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa de ni mtshams med pa lnga pas kyang shin tu lci ba ste/sems bskyed pa de ni
265a1('bum): de bas kyang shin tu lci bar rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dben pa'i yon tan ston cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
265a2('bum): po'i drung du nye bar 'ongs te/'di skad du de bzhin gshegs du ni dben pa'i yon tan gsung ba'o zhes zer te/rab 'byor ngas ni 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems
265a3('bum): dpa' chen po'i dgon pa'am/nags 'dab bam/bas mkha'i gnas dben par ma bshad do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar dgon pa dang /nags
265a4('bum): 'dab dang /bas mtha'i gnas dben pa ma lags na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dben pa gzhan ni gang zhig mchis/bcom ldan 'das byang chub
265a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dben pa gzhan ni ji lta bu zhig mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gral te byang chub sems dpa' sems
265a6('bum): dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas dben na/dgon pa dang /nags 'dra ba dang /bsna mapa'i gnason rnam par spyad pa yin te
265a7('bum): rab 'byor 'di ni dben pa ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la nges gnang ba'o//gal te dben pa 'dis nyin mtshan du rnam par spyod no//byangango chub
265b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i dben pas dben pa rnam par spyod pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgon pa
265b2('bum): dang /nags 'dab dang /bas mtha'i gnas na rnam par spyod kyang nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang 'dres par rnam par spyod na/byang chub sems dpa'
265b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po de ni mi dben par rnam par spyod pa yin no//gal te grong na spyod kyang nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mu 'dris na/byang chub sems
265b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dben par rnam par spyod pa yin no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la dben pa'i rnam pa de lta bu ngas gnang ba
265b5('bum): las dris shing bdud sdig to can de la dgon pa dang /nags 'dab dang /bos mtha'i gnas su rnam par spyod cig ces dben pa ston te/de dben pa des 'du 'dzir gyur cing //
265b6('bum): nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang 'dres pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa ma yin te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs
265b7('bum): su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro//de de ltar rnam par spyod pa des rnam par spyod cing yid la bya ba yongs su ma dag pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan grong
266a1('bum): 'dab na rnam par spyod cing yid la bya ba yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/nyan thos kyi sems drang ma 'dres pa/rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang ma 'dres pa/
266a2('bum): /de ma yin pa sdig pa'i sem pa gzhan dang ma 'dres pa/bsum gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa dang /mngon
266a3('bum): par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dag la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed de/thabs mi mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bas dgon pa sbrul dang ra dgas
266a4('bum): dang /bya yod pa rkun po dang /sme sho can yod pa/gcan gzan mtsho ba can dang /srin po rgyu ba dpag tshad brgya tsam du 'phags pa de lta bu'i nang na 'dug cing /
266a5('bum): lo gcig gam/lo brgya'am/lo stong ngam/lo brgya phrag stong ngam/lo bye ba'am/lo byi ba phrag brgya'am/lo bye ba phrag stong ngam/lo bye ba brgya phrag stong
266a6('bum): ngam/lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong ngam/de bas kyang lhag par gnas su zin kyang dben po gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i
266a7('bum): bsam pa la yang dag par gnas shing rnam par spyod pa de lta bu'i dben pa shes par mi 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos dang /
266b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byad mang po dang 'dres pa nyid du rnam par spyod par 'gyur te/dben pa de la yang dag par gces par gnas shing chags pa dang zhan
266b2('bum): cing mngon par zhen pa de tsam gyis ni de'i ser+b+ba sA rudris par mi 'gyur te/ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la dben pa gang bshad pa'i dben pa de dang ma
266b3('bum): ldan pas dben pa de la mi granas so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar dedun pA de dang bral ba'i phyir te/de ltar de'i drung du bdud sdig to n+dan nye bar 'ongs shing /steng gi
266b4('bum): bar snang la gnas te/'di skad du rigs kyi bu legs so legs so//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i dben pa ma nor ba yin gyis khyod dben pa 'di nyid
266b5('bum): kyis ni rnam par spyod cig/des khyod myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes zer te/de'i rgyas de dben
266b6('bum): pa de bas kyang dben pa de gces par 'dzin cing /phyir grong 'drab tu 'ongs nas/dge slong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa sems dang yid la bya ba yongs su dag pa des
266b7('bum): dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa/gzhan dag la tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag ni 'du 'dzi'i rnam par spyod pas rnam par spyod do zhes khyad du gsod cing byang chub sems dpa' sems
267a1('bum): dpa' chan po dben par spyod pa d+mo dag la 'du 'job rnam par spyod par skyon du gdagus pa dang /'dres par rnam par spyod par skyon du gdags pas
267a2('bum): brnyas pa'i sems bskyed do//gang 'du 'dzi'i rnam par spyod pas rnam par spyod pa de dag la ni dben pas rnam par spyod pas 'dzin cing /de dag la rim gror bskyed
267a3('bum): do//gang la rim gro bskyed par bya ba de dag la ni nga rgyal bskyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar bdag ni mi ma yin pas bskul ba'o//mi ma yin pas dran par bya
267a4('bum): ba'o//rnam par spyod pa gang gis bdag spyod pa de ni rnam paro spyad pa ma nor ba ste/grong 'dab na spyod pa la lta su zhig bskul bar 'gyur/grong 'dab na spyod pa lta su zhig
267a5('bum): dran par byed par 'gyur zhes nga rgyal bskyed de/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu gzhan dag la spyod par byed do//rab 'byor
267a6('bum): gang zag de ni byang chub sems dpa' gdol par rig paro bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sun 'byin par rig par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan du rnyog/
267a7('bum): bar bya'o//de ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rkun po ste/de ni lha dang mo dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis dge sbyong gi cha bya
267b1('bum): rkun por rig par bya ste/ngang tshul de lta bu dang ldan pa'i gang zag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis bsnyen par mi bya/bsten par mi bya//
267b2('bum): rim gror mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor gang zag de lta bu dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad
267b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su mo btang laM/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yongs su ma btong na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa thag
267b4('bum): pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya bar 'dod pa/sems can thams cad kyi don bya bar 'dod pa des/gang zag de lta bu'i ngang
267b5('bum): tshul can bsnyen par mi bya/bsten par mi bya/rim gror mi bya'i/rang gi don dang ldan par 'gyur ba la brtson par bya ste/'khor ba las rtag tu skyo zhing 'jigs pa'i yid
267b6('bum): kyis khams gsum dang mi 'dres par spyad par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' gdol pa de la'ang byams pa bskyed par bya ste/de nyid la snying brtse ba'i phyir snying rje bskyed par bya'o//
267b7('bum): dga' ba dang btang snyoms bskyed par bya'o//des sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ci nas kyang bdag gi nyis pa 'di dag thams cad du thams cad med cing mi skye bar 'gyur ba
268a1('bum): de lhur bya'o//gal sgyus na 'dra myur du srung bar bya'o zhes bslab par bya ste/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
268a2('bum): gis khong du chud pa'i mngon par shes pa'i mthur rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang
268a3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la bsnyen par bya'o//bsten par bya'o//rim gror bya'o//
268a4('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i yeshes gnyen du rig par 'byi ba de dag gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
268a5('bum): stsal pa/rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i be shes gnyen du rig par bya'o//rab 'byar
268a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//rab 'byor nyan thos
268a7('bum): gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug brjod cing ston pa dang /'chad cing 'grel pa dang /rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed pa dang /yang dag paro ston pa de dag kyang byang chub
268b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/
268b2('bum): kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//dran pa nye bar 'azhag pa bzhin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chun po rnams kyi dado pa'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//yang
268b3('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rim par bya'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
268b4('bum): chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//dbang po lnga ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//stobs
268b5('bum): lha ni byed rlub sems dada' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
268b6('bum): bo rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rlig+sa par+ya Sh+Ta//'phags pa'i lam yan log brgyad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnye/
268b7('bum): du rig par bya'o//'phags pa'o bye de rnam bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon pa rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//bsam gtan bzhin
269a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//tshad med pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dnga' sems dpa'i tshun
269a2('bum): /bo rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i

269a7('bum): bi ni po shes gnyen du rig par bya'o//gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i yeshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//de bzhin
269b1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs ducu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o//mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sem
269b2('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi dog pa'i ba shes gnyen du rig par bya'o//so sa yang dag par rig pa bzhin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i ba shes ga

269b7('bum): pa drug ni ma'o//pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni pha'o//stong pa nyid thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/stong pa nyid thams cad ni
270a1('bum): lam mo//stong pa nyid thams cad ni snang ba'o//stong pa nyid thams cad ni sgron ma'o//stong pa nyid thams cad ni bla'o//stong pa nyid thams cad ni shes pa'o//

270a3('bum): cad ni ma'o//stong pa nyid thams cad ni pha'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/dran pa nye bar

270a5('bum): bzhi ni dpung gnyen no//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni skyabs so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni mgon no//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni ma'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa

270a7('bum): par spong ba bzhi ni snang ba'o//yang dag pa ro spong ba bzhi ni sgren ma'o//blo'o shes pa'o shes rab bo//yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni dpung gnyen no//yang dag par spong
270b1('bum): ba bzhi ni skyabs so//yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni mgon no//yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni ma'o//yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni pha'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni byang chub

272b1('bum): chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni lam mo//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni snang ba'o//mthar gyis

272b7('bum): zlar thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang/mtshan mi med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni dpung gnyen no//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong po nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /sman pa med
273a1('bum): sa ni skyabs so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni mgon no//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan//

273a3('bum): /sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston par rig par bya ste/mngon par shes pa rnams ni lam mo//mngon par shes pa rnams ni snang ba'o//mngon par shes bya/

273b6('bum): no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni ma'o//de bzhin grwa shegs pa'i stobs bcu ni pa'o//mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen de rnams
273b7('bum): ston par rig par bya ste/mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni lam mo//mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni snang ba'o//mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni sman ma'o//zla'o shes pa'o shes rab bo//mi 'jig

274b1('bum): rgyas kyi tshe snga ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni ma'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni ba'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/

274b4('bum): mA'o//lam gyi rnam pa shrIs pa nyid ni pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong bar byed pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de
274b5('bum): ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni 'odas pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig
274b6('bum): byu ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi'ang yab dang yum du gyur to//rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de
274b7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'drim re dza ka br-i ra mtha dang yum du 'gyur ro/
275a1('bum): 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig
275a2('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi'ang yab dang yum du gyur to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar 'di las byung ba ni 'das pa dang //
275a3('bum): ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams te/rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
275a4('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya bar 'dod//
275a5('bum): pas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams bsdu bar bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na/sbyin pa dang /tshig snyan po dang /don spyad pa dang /don mthun pa ste/rab 'byor ngas don//
275a6('bum): gyi dbang de mthong bas 'di skad du 'di lta ste/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ston pa dang /
275a7('bum): dang ba dang dpung gnyen dang skyabs dang mgon yin no zhes brjod do//rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bya
275b1('bum): bar 'dod pa dang /gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa la gnas par 'dod pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi the tshom bcad par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar
275b2('bum): 'dod pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems
275b3('bum): dpa' chen pos chos gang la bslab par bya ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las rgya cher bstan to//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
275b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu logs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor nam mkha' ltar rdzogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
275b5('bum): phyin pa'o//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan nyid gang yang med do//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
275b6('bum): mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchis pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu mchis sam/bcom ldan
275b7('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid kyis chos thams cad//
276a1('bum): rad do//ngo bo'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dngon pa ste/chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis dngon pa'o//chos thams
276a2('bum): cad ni chos thams cad kyis spang ba'o//rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /dben pa'i mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol
276a3('bum): tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad yod do//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis dben la/chos
276a4('bum): thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong na/sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba'ang ji ltar mchis par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das dben
276a5('bum): pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur/stong pa nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur/dben pa dang
276a6('bum): stong pa nyid ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi rgya/dben pas ni stong pa nyid la chos gang yang mi nga migs/dben pasan
276a7('bum): byung ma nyid las sems can gang byang chub tu mang rdo pa rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'di lta bumi dmigs na/sa sa sbyin 'as bstan pa de'i ngan bdag gyis rdzi sa sa
276b1('bum): bar babya/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sems can rnams yun rnying po nas bdag dang bdag gi zhes bya ba la spyod dam/gsol pa/
276b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de de ltar lags so//bde bar gshegs pa de de ltar lags te/sems can rnams yun ring po nas bdag dang bdag gir bgyi ba la spyod do//bcom ldan/
276b3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/'on kyang bdag dang bdag gir bya ba dben zhing steng ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dben no//bdo bai
276b4('bum): gshegs pa stong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/'on kyang bdag dang bdag gir bya dam sems can rnams kun tu rgyug cing kun tu//
276b5('bum): 'khor bar gyur tama?/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags s+ho//bde bar gshegs pa da de lce legs te/bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag kaur bgyi bar snyoms can
276b6('bum): rnams kun du rgyug cing kun du 'khor bar gyur te//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ltar na sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mong 'i yod pa yin te//
276b7('bum): gang la bdag tu bya ba med pa dang /bdag gir bya ba med pa de la 'dzin pa med/gang la 'dzin pa med pa de la sems can kun tu rgyug cing kun du 'khor nga med do//de la kun
277a1('bum): nas nyon mongs pa gang yang med pas/rab 'byor de ltar na sems can rnams kyi rnam par byung ba yod pa yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub
277a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/gzugs la mi spyod/tshar ba la mi spyod/'du shes la mi spyod/'du byed la mi spyod/rnam par shes pa la mo spyod do//
277a3('bum): mig la mi spyod/rna ba la mi spyod/sna lo mi spyod/lce la mi spyod/lus la mi spyod/yid la mi spyod do//gzugs la mi spyod/sgra la mi spyod/dri la mi spyod/re la mi
277a4('bum): spyod/reg lo me spyod/chos la mi spyod do//mag gi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/lho'i rnam par
277a5('bum): shes pa la mi spyod/lus kyi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi spyod do//mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la mi spod/
277a6('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod/lce'i 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi spyod do//mig gi 'dus te rlig pa'i rkyen
277a7('bum): gyis tshor ba la mi spyod/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi spyod/sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi spyod/lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis char
277b1('bum): ba la mi spyod/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi spyod/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi spyad do//sa'i khams la mi spyod/chu'i khams la mi spyod//
277b2('bum): me'i khams la mi spyod/rlung gi khams la mi spyod/nam mkha'i khams la mi spyod/rnam par shes pa'i khams lo mi spyod do//ma rig pa la mi spyod/'du byed la mi spyod/rnam
277b3('bum): par shes pa la mi spyod/ming dang gzugs la mi spyad/skye mched drug la mi spyod/reg pa la mi spyod/tshor ba la mi spyod/sred pa la mi spyod/len pa la mi spyod/srid pa la mi
277b4('bum): spyod/skye ba la mi spyod/rga shi la mi spyod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyod/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/brtson
277b5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//nang stong pa nyid la mi spyad/phyi stong pa nyid la mi
277b6('bum): spyod/phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod/chen po stong pa nyid la mi spyod/don dam pa stong po nyid la mi spyod/'dus byas stong pa nyid la mi spyod//
277b7('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mi spyod/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod/thog ma dang tho ma med pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod/dor ba med po sbyor ba nyid la mri t+ta /
278a1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid la mo spyod/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mi spyod/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod//
278a2('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi spyod//
278a3('bum): yang dag par spang ba rnams la mo spyod/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi spyod/dbang po rnams la mi spyod/stobs rnams la mi spyod/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
278a4('bum): la mi spyod/'phags pa'i lam yon lag brgyad pa la mi spyod/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi spyod/bsam gtan rnams lo mi spyod/tshad med pa rnams la
278a5('bum): mi spyod/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi spyod/rnam par thar pa brgyad la mi spyod/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms por 'jug pa dgu le mi spyod//
278a6('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la mi spyod/mngon par shes pa rnams la mi spyod/ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi spyod//gzungs
278a7('bum): kyi sgo rnams la mi spyod/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mi spyod/mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mi spyod/so so yang dag por rig pa bzhi la mi spyod/byams pa chen
278b1('bum): la myi spyod/rje chen po la mi spyod/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dus pa bco brgyad pa mi spyod/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mi spyod/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la/
278b2('bum): mi spyod/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi spyod/dgra bcom pa nyid la mi spyod/rang byang chub la mi spyod/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mi spyod/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
278b3('bum): pa nyid la mi spyod do//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gang spyod pa dang /brang gis spyod pa dang /gang lo spyod par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad mi dmigs so//bcom
278b4('bum): ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcos pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi thub pa ste/bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod
278b5('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang /rlung sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zil gyis gnon par mi nus so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di ltar 'di lta
278b6('bum): ste/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa'i gnas zil gyis mi non pa la gnas pas/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad
278b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid yid la bgyid pa dang ma bral ba ni zil gyis mi non pa ste/bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad
279a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gal te dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag
279a2('bum): thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de dag nam 'tshe'i bar du
279a3('bum): bzhugs pa de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la ga zhig gis rim gror byas/bkur sti byas/phu drud du byas+dza/mchod pa byas te/dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med pa
279a4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyas mang du 'phel lam
279a5('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
279a6('bum): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /'chad pa dang /rnam par dazhom pa dang /rab tu gzhog pa dang /'gre pa dang nga/rnam par 'byed pa dang /

279b1('bum): 'phel lo//rab 'byor gal te gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mo'i lus thob par gyur te/bla na med pa yang

279b5('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /'chad pa dang /rnam par gzhog
279b6('bum): pa dang /rab tu gzhog pa dang /'grel ba dang /rnam par 'byed pa dang /gsal bar byed pa dang /yang dag par ston pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i
279b7('bum): yid la byed pas rnam par spyod na/de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//rab 'byor gal te stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga
280a1('bum): phyi med par mo'i lus thob par gyur la/bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur lnga/de dag na
280a2('bum): 'tsho'i bang du bzhugs pa la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gro byas/bkur sti byas/phu dud byas/mchod pa byas te/dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na

280a7('bum): rab 'byor gal te stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lu ba thob par gyur te/bla na med pa yang dag

281a1('bum): gyur la/de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs pa la/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rim gro byas/bkur sti byas/phu dud byas/mchod pa/

281a7('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /
281b1('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkad pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /lan cig

282a1('bum): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /gzugs med pa'i/

282b1('bum): du 'pheb lo//rab 'byor gal te stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can dang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/de dag rigs kyi bu 'am

283a1('bum): gzhog pa dang /rab tu gzhog pa dang /'grel pa dang /rnam par 'byed pa dang /gsal bar byed pa dang /yang dag par ston na/de'i bsod nams ches
283a2('bum): mang du 'phel lo//rab 'byor gal te steng gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/dri dag

283a6('bum): dkod pa dang /rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod de/dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par
283a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsdus na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa//
283b1('bum): myo ldan 'das mang ngo //'dra bar gra shogs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor do bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rags
283b2('bum): kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang /'chad pa dang /rnam par gzhog pa dang /rab tu go zhog pa dang /rnam par 'grol pa dang /

283b4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sngo phyi med par myi'i lus thob par gyur la/de drag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dge ba
283b5('bum): bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi lo rab tu bkod pa dang /tshad med pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
283b6('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi la rab tu bkod pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /lan cig phyir
283b7('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu le rab tu bkod pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod pa dang /rang byang chub la rab tu bkod pa dang /
284a1('bum): na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rang du bkod de/dag pa'i rtsa ba de'ang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos
284a2('bum): 'byor du ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu'am ring/sa kyi bu mo de'i bas nams de'i rjes mang du 'phel la ma/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ma dro//'de bar gshegs
284a3('bum): po mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/rab 'byor de bas kyang rogs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la ston pa dang //
284a4('bum): 'chad pa dang /rnam par gzhog pa dang /rab tu gzhog pa dang /'grel pa dang /rnam par 'byed pa dang /gsal bar byed pa dang /yang dag par snyan na/de'i bsod
284a5('bum): nams ches mang du 'phel lo//rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'dzin po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/rna
284a6('bum): par 'byed pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gonas su 'dra ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/don+ti 'di ltar de bzhin gshogs pa dbye bcoM ma pa yang dag par rdzogs
284a7('bum): sangs rgyas ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa de ste bu ni sebs can gang pa'ang med de/rdo ci'i phyir zha na/de ni 'di ltar rigs
284b1('bum): kyibu de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de'i rnga/byams pa chen po mngon par bsgrub ste/de dag shes rab kyi rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'am/sems can thams cad gsang
284b2('bum): par 'gyur ba dang 'dra bar lta ste/de dag snying rje chen po 'thob bo//de dag rnam par spyod pa des/rnam par spyod pas dga' bas rab tu dga' ba dang /mngon par dga' bar 'gyur
284b3('bum): te/de dag dga' ba chen po mngon par sgrub pa//de dag mtshan ma de dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/de dag btang snyoms chen po 'thob bo//rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa'
284b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis shes rab kyi snang ba chen po ste/'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin po'i snang po'o//bzod pa'i pha rol
284b5('bum): tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o//rigs kyi bu de dag/
284b6('bum): ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sengs ma rgyas kyang /sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur te/blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
284b7('bum): byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par spyod pa'i phyir/ru gas dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /
285a1('bum): nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /yo byad la yongs su spyod pa'i gtong ba dang /sbyin pa dag gi sbyin pa dag par 'gyur te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye/
285a2('bum): bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byer de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod par khams kyi bsod snyoms la yongs su spyod par 'dod pa dang /sems can thams
285a3('bum): cad kyi lam bstan par 'dod pa dang /snang ba chen po 'byung bar 'dod pa dang /khams gsum gyi btson ran gnas pa'i sems can rnams yongs su dgol bar 'dod pa dang /
285a4('bum): sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi mog bskyed par 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rtag tu rgyan mi ched par gnas
285a5('bum): par bya'o//gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par mi spyod na'ang /des yid la bya ba gzhan
285a6('bum): gyi gau skabs mi dbye ste/des ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba nyid kyis nyin mtshan du mi gtong zhing brtson por gnas pa de lta ro bya'o//rab
285a7('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sngon chad nor bu rin po che rnyed ma myong ba'i skyes bu zhig yod la des dus gzhan zhig na nor bu rin po che rnyed par gyur te/des nor bu rin po che de rnyed
285b1('bum): pas dga' ba dang /spro ba dang /yid bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa las/des nor bu rin po che de rnyed ma thag tu stor bar gyur na/de'i rgyus sdug bsngal ba dang /yod mi bde//
285b2('bum): nga chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/rtag tu rgyun mi ched par gyi hu dang dag ni yid du 'ong ba'i nor bu rin po che de dang bral bar gyur to zhes nor bu rin po che dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba//

291b4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod dam/bcom ldan 'das ci legs/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/bcom ldan 'das ci lags//

291b6('bum): spyod dam/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/dgra bcom po nyid shes

292a1('bum): pa shes pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyi pa la spyod dam/com ldan 'das rgya lags/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/

306b2('bum): kyi stong pa nyid dang /gtog nyid dang /blas pa nyid dong /rag lus pa nyid dang /snying pa mchis pa nyid dang /de bzhin nyid dang /mnor ba de bzhin nyid dang /glan nu ma yin

312a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la skyed dam/bcom ldan 'dab ci lags/rnam pa thams cad ma byin pa nyid kyi stod pa nyi dang /gsog nyid dang /gso nyid dang //rag du slo ba nyid dang /snying

312a6('bum): rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
312b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa'i rgyanamarje ltar shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal spyod pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems chos gang shes rab kyi
312b2('bum): tuphyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de khyod kyis mthong ngam/gsol pabacom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/gang la
312b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mA lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
312b4('bum): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/chos byang khyod kyis ma mthong ba'i chos de dmigs su yod dam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das
312b5('bum): kyis bkra' stsal pa/ro 'byor dI ji stem du sems/chos gang dmigs su med pa de skye ba'am 'gug par 'gyur ram/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan
312b6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'dzi ni ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa ste/rab 'byor bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub
312b7('bum): mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/rab 'byor 'drin sgribs bcu dang /mi 'dzi
313a1('bum): ba ban dang /so so yang dag par rig pazhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i lam zhes bya ste/lam der zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
313a2('bum): chen po de ltar spyod de ltar rtsal de ltar 'bad pa ni bla na meng ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ye shes chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par mi 'gyur
313a3('bum): zhes bya ba'i gnas meng do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir te/de'i chos de dag ni bla
313a4('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs por sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang yongs su 'grib por mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan
313a5('bum): 'das ci lags/chos thams cad kyi mi skye ba nyid gang lags pa de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
313a6('bum): bstan par 'gyur ram/bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/rab 'byor don ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/skye ba'ang ma lag so//mi skye ba'ang ma
313a7('bum): lags pa las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan tam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/
313b1('bum): skyed ngan mnanan/ga la pabs ldan 'das ga /skyo ba'ang ma labs/bskyob ma lags pa la nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon pa dran mod pa ya dag/
313b2('bum): por rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan ne/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar bla na med pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'jum bcas
313b3('bum): ldan 'das kyis ga' stsal pa/rab 'byor de rngo snyam dus smras/gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu khyed kyis yang dag
313b4('bum): pa rnaMs su mthong ngam/gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das chos gang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ba stun par 'gyur
313b5('bum): ba'i chos de dag ni bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'chang //
313b6('bum): chub dang /gang mngon pang rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi bde lta bu'i chos kyang bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ra
313b7('bum): 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag ni mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o//
314a1('bum): 'das ni mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bya'o//'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de/
314a2('bum): ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa de thams cad med pa'i phyir te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor
314a3('bum): shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/lde'u bzhi bcu lnga pa'o///de nas khyau
314a4('bum): dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zab pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
314a5('bum): phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du ngalta dka' ba'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben po'i slad du rtogs par dka' ba'o//bcom ldan 'das
314a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du brtag tu ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du brtag pa'i spyod
314a7('bum): yul ma lags pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu dben pa'i slad du zhi ba phra ba zhib pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
314b1('bum): shin tu dngon pa'i slad du ma ngas shing rlig pas rtogs par bgyi ba'o//bcom ldan 'das sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /'chang
314b2('bum): zhing klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /de bzhin nyid du nan tan bzud cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar
314b3('bum): du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma lags su//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de de bzhin
314b4('bum): ni//de de bzhin te/sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di nyan cing /'dzin pa dang /'chang zhing klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /de bzhin nyid du den tun
314b5('bum): byed cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par spangs rgyas kyi bar du/sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de dag ni dge//
314b6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba tha ma dang ldan pa ma yin no//kau shi ka du ji snyam du sems/dze mu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed pa de drag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ljon par gyur/bsam
314b7('bum): gtan bzhi dang ldan par gyur/tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur/
315a1('bum): 5rigs zhu'am rags kyi rnamal banan na na smo dru /ga kun chub par byed par 'gyur
315a2('bum): nga/klags sh+tsi /rgyu pa byas nas nga /dezhin nyid dun tan b+h+yam shrIg na dil ma'i dge ba'i des ng+ge
315a3('bum): /stong du u 'i gyu/ ga ga y-imi gyur//rkye pa'i ra gyu
315a4('bum): ra yid nye bar mi 'gyur// \u0f7fgas rgyu rlung byu 'bru'o//rgyug d+hA kyig na ts+tsha gyul//
315a5('bum): dang /dgrang ba dang /dpe dang rgyur yang mi brjod do//de nas dge slong gcig pa'i lha'i da byin la'i da ce so smras so//kau shrI ka dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can dge ba'adu/
315a6('bum): las kyi ma dang ldan pa/bsam gtan pa ni dang ldan pa/tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa/gzug so me pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan pa/mngon par shes pa ldad
315a7('bum): ldan pa de dag da ni/ga yulam rigs kyi ma gang shes 'i rje byin pa za mo 'di ma g.yeng ba sa sa 'dzin pa dang /'ang ba dang /klag pa /
315b1('bum): sna dang /rdul na du yod / dag ban da rgyun b+h+yong spyong/blan med pa yang dan par rdzogs na pa ga
315b2('bum): mamo dang snyoms byung 'i na ni byed bu dadag pa na /de srid rgyas sus pa dang / 'o/na rnaMs dag phreng dul 'du
315b3('bum): //dani slong myu gli gi sems na ga pa 'i mi dang ldanu na na dang sbyin du/rgyad sa su da rtson pa med 'i
315b4('bum): laM zla ni rdzun pa/smon pa nas pa nga sbyin pa de dag rnam chub sams mas dzin du rnam ma mkhyen pa da dang sbyin
315b5('bum): smyed pa da/d+yar+b+ha TIng /klags shA rgyu pa na pad de hrI du nan byed nilce dang mau dug/ma na du
315b6('bum): rten gyi gyi mganan par 'gyu /byangan gyi'i mis ma ma chen ni gyi dang ma dang la ma yin sbyin gyi rjes na
316a1('bum): ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar yang ma zad de/byang chub sems
316a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang
316a3('bum): zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro//rgyun du zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas su'ang ma zad de/byang chub
316a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
316a5('bum): pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon
316a6('bum): po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji
316a7('bum): snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub
316b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon
316b2('bum): cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang brtson
316b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro//brtson 'grus
316b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ma zad de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
316b5('bum): spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
316b6('bum): la spyod par yang ma zad de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du spyod pa de dag ni lha dang mi drang lha ma yin
316b7('bum): du bcos pa'i 'jig rten gyi zil gyis gnon par mi nus so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni shing rab kyi rol tu phyir/
317a1('bum): pa ji skad du bstun pa dang mthun par spyod pa n+d+ha/byang chub sems papa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun mi bcad pa'o
317a2('bum): don du gnas pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cad ring du mi byed pa'o//de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
317a3('bum): dpa' chen po de ni snying po byang chub las 'phang bar mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/sems can dang ba rnams 'don par 'dod pa'o//de ltar slob
317a4('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/byang chub sems dpa'i bsgrub pa la slob pa ste/nyan thos kyi bslab pa la slob pa ma yin no//rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la
317a5('bum): slob pa ma yin no//de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dada' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'gro bar bya bar sems te nye bar 'dong zhing 'di skad ces
317a6('bum): smra'o//kye skyes bu chen po myur du slobaso shig/skyes bu chen po skyen par slobs shig/lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag ni khyod kyis snying po byang chub tu 'dug ste/bla na med pa yAng /
317a7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas blang bar bya ba ste/'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dog bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
317b1('bum): ngasargyas u bzhes pa'o zhes zer zhing ston to//de ltar shes rabak+Shi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/byang chub sa mas dA sems pa 'anan pa'i drung du rgyal po chen po ba /
317b2('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'dod par sems so//de'i drung du bdag kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'bri bA re sems so//lha'i rgyal po
317b3('bum): mtshe ma'ang /mche ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so//'i rgyal po rab dpa' ldan yang dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so//lha'i rgyal
317b4('bum): po rab 'phrul dga' yang /'phrul dga'i lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so//lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig
317b5('bum): 'gro bar sems so//tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pa'ang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig 'gro bar sems so//kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong ba ro sems
317b6('bum): dge rgyas kyi sgra rnams kyang nye bar 'dod par sems so//'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'ding bar sems so//mi che ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so//mi gdung
317b7('bum): ci lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so//shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so//gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong bar sems so//gan
318a1('bum): gtsang ma'i ngos kyi lha rnams kyang nye bar 'dong par sems so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa/
318a2('bum): dgra'i nA nags kyi rtag tu dngas pa yin te/sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shesar gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlo mi 'dri lang wA spyod pa
318a3('bum): lus la ni 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa gang ji snyed cig lus la 'byung ba de dag kyang thams cad du thams cad lus la mi 'byung mi 'bab ste/dge slong /
318a4('bum): de ni byeng chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/'di'i yon tan du 'gyur ba ste/'dus pa'i nad rnams gang ji snyed pa 'di lta
318a5('bum): ste/mig ga nod dam/rna ba'i nad dam/sna'i nad dam/lce'i nad dmA/lus kyi nad dmo/snying gi nad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang lus la mi 'byung mi 'bab ste/'di
318a6('bum): dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/'di'i yon tan du rigre par bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa dka' ba 'di
318a7('bum): snyam du gyur te/lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di rang gi spongs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sten cing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa brjod dam/
318b1('bum): te sangs rgyas kyi mthus ston snyam pa dang /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' ba'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/tshe dang ldan pa
318b2('bum): dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa dga' bo bdag dri ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan dang legs pa brjod pa ni
318b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi mthur rig par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dga' bo de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/lha'i dbang po
318b4('bum): brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan dang /legs pa brjod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o//de ni de
318b5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs so//dga' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
318b6('bum): byin pa la brtson par byed pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa de'i tshe grang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud sdig to tsan grang ji snyed cig yod pa
318b7('bum): de dag thams cad ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas te/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
319a1('bum): dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ram 'on te ma yun gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i//
319a2('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste/dogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
319a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe/bdud sdig to can mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
319a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/bdud sdig ti can ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid
319a5('bum): la byed pa las sems gcig tsam 'khrug par 'gyur ba dang /zhum par 'gyur ba dang /spu g.yo bar 'gyur bar skar mda' ltung bar gtong zhing 'jigaso pa bskyed do//
319a6('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci lags/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi
319a7('bum): drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsame pas mchi bar 'gyur ram/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams
319b1('bum): cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtso ba'i bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin no//dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji lta bu'i drung du mtsho bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis/
319b2('bum): bka' stsal pa/dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/sems mos par mi byas pa de'i drung du bdud sdig to
319b3('bum): can gci ba'i bsam pas nyo bar 'ong ngo //dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin
319b4('bum): nam/'on tam ma yin zhes the tshom du gyur pa de dag gi drung du bdod sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo //dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes
319b5('bum): gnyen dang bral na/des dge ba'i ba shes gnyen mi mthong bas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi thos so//ma thos pas mi shes so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar
319b6('bum): bsgom pa ma shes pas de bzhin nyid du nan tan mi byed do//dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub
319b7('bum): sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral la/dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa byed na/dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'i de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags
320a1('bum): rnyed par 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la bsngags pa brjod na/dri
320a2('bum): la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba ni bdag gi grogs yin te/gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba 'di
320a3('bum): ni/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa mang po'i nang nas/bdag gis grogs su rnyed pa ste/de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'di lta ste/nyan thos kyis dang rang
320a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis las gcig tu gnas par 'gyur ba ni/de bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o snyam ste/dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig
320a5('bum): to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu la bdud kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
320a6('bum): phyin pa zab mo di bstan pa'i tshe/'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab ste/khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pas ci zhig bya/bsgoms pa dang
320a7('bum): bzung ba dang /klags pa dang /kun chub par byas pas kyang ci zhig bya/ngas kyang de'i gting mo rnyed na/khyod kyis lta rnyed ra skan zhes zer na/dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' de
320b1('bum): lnga'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' brnyes pa bskyed
320b2('bum): cing /nga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o//nga ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o//nga ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o//nga ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
320b3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o//nga ni bsam gton gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o//nga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o//khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma
320b4('bum): yin no//khyod ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no//khyod ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no//khyod ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin/
320b5('bum): no//khyod ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no//khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no zhes rlom sems su byed na/dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'
320b6('bum): dride la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis grags rnyed par 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang grang gri tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog tu rlom sems bskyed na/dga' bo de'i tshe bdud
320b7('bum): sdig to can dga' ba dang /spro ba dang nyams bde ba dang /rab tu dga' ba dang /tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur te/dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' di la'ang bdud sdig te
321a1('bum): can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/byang chub sems dpa'i ming brjod pa'am/rus brjod pa kun tu grags par gyur na//
321a2('bum): de ming brjod pa 'am rus brjod pa des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dge ba'i chos can dag khyad du gsod cing bdag bstod gzhan smod la/phyir mo ldeg
321a3('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang tshul dang /mtshan mar bya ba'i yon tan de dag kyang de la med par rnam pa dang tshul dang /mtshan ma de dag gis
321a4('bum): nyon mongs pa bskyed cing bdag bstod gzhan smod de/'di skad du ji ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ba de ltar khyod
321a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par mi snang ngo //byang chub sems dpa' rigs la gnas par mi snang ngo zhes de de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
321a6('bum): de dag la mi snyan par brjod cing smod na/dri la bA du sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/bladag gi gnas ni stongs par mi 'gyur ro//sems can dmyal ba chen po dang /
321a7('bum): byol song gi skye gnas dang /gau shin rje'i 'jig rten dang /yi dgis kyi yul yang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes ci nas kyang de'i tshig bzung du rung bar 'gyur ba de
321b1('bum): de ltar bdud sdig to can byang chub sems dpa' do byin gyis rlob ste/dro'i cho ga bzung du rung bas skye bo mang po dag kyang mnyan pa dang /yod chos par bya bar sems te/de lnga de
321b2('bum): drag gos thos sem mthong na/mthun par spyod par 'gyur te/de dag gis thos sam mthong nas mthun par spyod cing de bzhin du slob ste/de dag de bzhin nyid du slob cing de bzhin
321b3('bum): nyid du nan tan byed pa'i tshe/nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/de ltar de dag bsam pa phyin ci log du gyur pas/lus dang ngag dang yid kyis las gang dang gang brtsams
321b4('bum): pa de thams cad mi 'dod pa drang /mi sdug pa dang yid du mi 'ong ba ro 'grub par 'gyur te/de ltar na sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/byol
321b5('bum): song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /yi dgas kyi yul yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur te/bdud kyi gnas kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas/dga' bo don gyi
321b6('bum): dbang de mthong nas/bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang /spro ba dang tshimA pa dang /yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang gal te gang zag byang chub sems drapa'i theg
321b7('bum): pa pa gang zag nyan thos kyi thog pa pa dang cod cing nga ni mchog tu gyur pa yin gyi/khyod ni ma yin no zhes zer na/de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/kye rigs kyi bu 'di
322a1('bum): ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste/'di ni rnam pa thams cad mdun pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'thab mo dang
322a2('bum): 'khrug pa dang rjod pa dang mtshang 'dru ba 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te/de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo//de ni byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam mo//
322a3('bum): de ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam mo//drini rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ma yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
322a4('bum): pa pa dang /gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thob cing rtsod la/'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na/de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te/'di gnyis ka'ang
322a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o//'di gnyis ka'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na//
322a6('bum): 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'ong gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam bu yin/rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang /byol song ngo /
322a7('bum): skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam brtsams so zhes nas dga' zhing spro ba dang /tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro//dga' bo gzhon yang gal te byang chub
322b1('bum): sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa/byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa la gnod par sems shing /'thab cing rtsod la 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru na/gal te des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
322b2('bum): panyid yongs su mi btang zhe na/tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang /'jab cing rtsad pa dang /'khrug cing mtshang 'dra bar gyur pa de srid kyi bskal par gi tsha bgo bar
322b3('bum): bya'o/dga' bas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de dag gi se mos bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sama'on te ma lags kyis bskal pa de snyed kho nur go cha bgo 'tshal/
322b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams langs
322b5('bum): 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te/dpa' bo de la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang /'thab cing rtsod la gshe zhing mi
322b6('bum): snyun du brjod pa dang /'thab cing rkyeni de ga sha ba dang /mi snyan por brjod pa byas nas/phyir mo chags par mdud par 'dzin cing khon du gzung ste gnas na/dga' bo gang zag
322b7('bum): ni 'byung ba dang mi smra ste/gaN lAng+ge phre gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid yongs su mi btang zhe na/bdon mi za bar bskal pa de hUMd du go cha bgo bar bya'o//dga' bo byung
323a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thabs shing rtsod do gshe ba dang mi snyan par brjod par gyur na'ang /mdud par mi 'dzin la phyin chad sdom pa
323a2('bum): 'dzin cing /bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nyes par thob ste/bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dgos na/da ltar bdag smras pa la phyir smra ba dang /bdag
323a3('bum): gris sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na/de ltar bdag gzhan la ma snyan par skye zhing /phyir zlogs pa ni mi tshul gyis/bdag gis de ltar mi bya'i/bdag
323a4('bum): gis glen pa dang /lkug pa bzhin du bya'o//bdag gi bsam pa la 'khrug pa med par bya'o//sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogos pa'i byang
323a5('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya dgos na/de dag nyid lnga bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug po ni
323a6('bum): tshul ma yin gyis bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su mi bya'o//bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o snyam na/dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
323a7('bum): de ni 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de/de la ni bdud sdig to can grags lta zhing glags tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed do//dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
323b1('bum): dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan thos kyi theg bya ba dag drung 'grogs par mi bya'o//de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas par mi bya'o//'dug par mi bya'o//gal te 'dug na'ang des su 'a
323b2('bum): gnod sems su mi bya 'khrug par mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang bdag gris 'di dag la gnod sems su bya ba dang /'khrug par bya ba de ni bdag la mi tshul lo//de ci'i
323b3('bum): phyir zhe na/'di ltar du dag ni bdag gis bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar
323b4('bum): bya ba dag go snyam du bya'o//dga' bas gsel ba/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang
323b5('bum): gnas par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
323b6('bum): ngos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ni bdag gi grogs te gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o//'dis ji ltar bslab par bya ba de
323b7('bum): bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o//'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul drims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
324a1('bum): du phyin pa dang /bsam gtan kyang rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyang rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
324a2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /de ni dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus pa byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa

324a4('bum): pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
324a5('bum): bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam ya/

324b1('bum): lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa
324b2('bum): bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /thams cad shes pa nyid dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam

325a1('bum): nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces pastsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thos

325b7('bum): za nyid do//rab 'byor gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /tshor ba ni tshor bas stong /'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong /'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong /rnam par shes pa ni rnam
326a1('bum): par shes byas stong /mig ni mig gis stong /rna ba ni rna bas stong /sna ni snas stong /lce ni lces skyong /luHnI lus kyis stong /yid ni yid kyis stong /gzugs
326a2('bum): ni gzugs kyi stong /sgra ni smras stong /dri ni dris stong /ro na ros stong /re bra ni rig gis stong /chos ni chos kyis stong /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes
326a3('bum): pas stong /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong /sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong /lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes

326a7('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong /sna'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sna

326b6('bum): ni len pas stong /srid pa ni srid pas stong /skye ba ni skye bas stong /rga sha ne rga shis stong /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong /tshul khrims kyi pha

327a1('bum): rol tu phyin pas stong /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha
327a2('bum): rol tu phyin pas stong /nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong /phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong /stong pa nyid stong
327a3('bum): pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong /chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /'dus byas stong
327a4('bum): pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
327a5('bum): nyid kyis stong /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /rang
327a6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rlung gi mtshan
327a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong /
327b1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni
327b2('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong /
