327b4('bum): yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong /bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan
327b5('bum): rnams kyis stong /tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa rnams kyis stong /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis steng /
327b6('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug 'i rnams kyis stong /
327b7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pas stong /mngon
328a1('bum): na mngon par na m+b+ha/ 'dzin nam n-i rgyu na spyong/glu spyan pas nig rgyu ma
328a2('bum): kyis stong /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong /mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong /seM sa yung
328a3('bum): dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong /byams pa chen po ni byams rje chen pos stong /snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos skyong /sngangs rgyas kyi chos
328a4('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams ni spangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni
328a5('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir mi 'dra ba'i 'bras bus stong /dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong /rang byang chub ni rang byung
328a6('bum): chub kyis stong /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sto ste/
328a7('bum): 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

351a1('bum): yid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/yod 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa

351a3('bum): slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nom/gzugs 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob po
351a4('bum): yin nam/gzugs 'grag por bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/gzugs mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad
351a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/sgra zod par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/sgro 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob
351a6('bum): nano/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin namo/sgra 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob no/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam+ba/sna mo skye bar bya ba'i
351a7('bum): phyir slob na/rnam pa thamaso cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/dri zad par bya ba'i phyir slob ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/dri 'dod chags
351b1('bum): nga bral bar bya ra sgrub na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/dri 'gag par dra bya'i phyir slong na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin na/
351b2('bum): drim skye bar bye ba'i phyir sgrib /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/ro zad par bya na'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/
351b3('bum): 'dod tshigs dang bralo bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rlob pa yin namo/ro 'ogag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sgrub
351b4('bum): ba ldan napa/ro ma skye bar bya bar phyir slod ni/rnas byathams cad ma khyen pa nyid du slob pa yin na/reg zad par bya ba'i phyir skye ba na/rnam pa rnams cad maldan pa
351b5('bum): pa yin nam/reg 'dod tshogs dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sgrub pa yin nam/reg 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob /rnam pa mas
351b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/reg ma skye bar bya ba'i phyir slong na/rnam pa bam so cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin num/chos zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa
351b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/chos 'dod tshogs dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yon na mo//chos 'gag pa

352a2('bum): pa yin nam/mig gi rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/mig gi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang
352a3('bum): bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/migo gi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
352a4('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/mig gi rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nom/rna ba'i rnam par shes po
352a5('bum): zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa

352a7('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid du slob pa yin nam/sna'i rnam par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na//

352b2('bum): nam/sna'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob po yin nom/sna'i rnam par shes pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na

352b4('bum): par shes pa 'dod chagasnga dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/lce'i rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam

352b6('bum): par shes pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob po yin nom/lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam
352b7('bum): pathams cad mkhyen po nyid du slob pa yin nam/lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob po yin nom//lus

354a1('bum): rnam/lus kyi 'dus te rig pa zad par bya 'du da stso sa/rnam pa thams dad+ma marlon pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/smras kyi 'das te reg pa 'dod chags dang

354a6('bum): pamo skye bar bya ba'i spyir slo rnam pa thams cad bakhyen pa nyid du skyob pa yon nam/mig gi 'dus te reg pa los byung ba'i rgyu chud par bya ba'i phyir slo na/

354b2('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mokhyen po nyid du slob pa yin nam/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zad par

358b1('bum): rmugs dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/srid pa 'gags par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
358b2('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nom/srid pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin na mo/skye ba zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam po thams
358b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/skye bo 'dod tshogs dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid du slob pa yin nA ma/skye ba 'grag par
358b4('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/skye bo mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnamo pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam//
358b5('bum): rgo shi zod par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin na mo/rgo shi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad ma khye
358b6('bum): panyid du slob po yin nam/rga shi 'grag par bya ba'i byor slob ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/rga shi mo spro bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam
358b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/sbyin
359a1('bum): b+ha hrI rol phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sgrub na/rnam pa bams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
359a2('bum): 'gug par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob /rnam pa tham sngo cang
359a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid du slob pa yin nAm/tshul khrims kyi
359a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gog par bya
359a5('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nAmA/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po
359a6('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid du slob pa yin nam/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
359a7('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thamaso cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir rlob na/
359b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin+da nam/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi skyo bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/bcan
359b2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/brtson 'grus kyi bo rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar
359b3('bum): bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob no/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
359b4('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob nu/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/bsam gtan gyi phyi ral
359b5('bum): tu phyin pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir
359b6('bum): slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob no/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa
359b7('bum): yin nam/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya/
360a1('bum): pa'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slo ba yin nam/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam/
360a2('bum): pa thams ca mkhyen po nyid du slob pa yin nam/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam//
360a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir skyob ma/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du skyob pa yin nam/nang stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa
360a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slong po yin nam/nang stong pa nyid 'dod chags drang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/nang
360a5('bum): stong pa nyid 'gog par bya ba'i phyir seM na/rnam pa thams cad myelen pa nyid du slob po yin nomo/nang stong pa nyid mo skye bar bze phyir slob /rnam pa thams cad
360a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob po yin namo/phyi stong pa nyid zad par bye ba'i phyir slob ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yinan ma kho phyi stong pa nyid 'dod chags da
360a7('bum): dra yo bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin namaphyi stong pa nyid 'gog par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
360b1('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nar/bya stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/phyi nang stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam//
360b2('bum): pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nom/phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral por bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob po yin nam/
360b3('bum): phyinang stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du skyob po yin namo/phyi nang stod pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams
360b4('bum): cod mkhyen pa nyid du sgrub pa yin na mo/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thamaso cad mkhyen pa nyid du sgrub po yin nam/stong pa nyid stong pa
360b5('bum): nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cod mkhyen pa nyid du slo ba pa yin nam/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slad na/
360b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du skyob pa yin nam/snang pa nyid stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slab na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob po yAn nAr
360b7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob po yon nam/chen po stong pa nyid 'dod chagos dang bral bar bya ba'i
361a1('bum): na/rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/chen po stong pa nyid 'gags par bya ba'i phyi slo na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
361a2('bum): du slob pa yin nam/chen po stong pa nyid mi skyo bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/don dam pa stong pa nyid thod par bya
361a3('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams
361a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/don dam pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/don dam
361a5('bum): bapa stong pa nyid mi skye bor bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/'dus byas stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa
361a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
361a7('bum): ba yin nam/'dus byas stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/'dus byas stong pa nyid mo
361b1('bum): bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
361b2('bum): ba yin nam/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dod chags deng bral bar bya ba'i phyir skyed na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yi nam/'dus mo byas stong pa nyid
361b3('bum): 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/'dus ma byas stong po nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad
361b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/mtha' las 'dun pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sgrib pa yin nama?/mtha' las
361b5('bum): 'dres pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/mtha' las 'dres pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya
361b6('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/mtha' las 'odas pa stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slong na/rnam pa thams cad ma khyen
361b7('bum): nyid du slob pa yin nam/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sgrib pa yin nam/thog ma dang tha ma med pa
362a1('bum): stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
362a2('bum): nyid 'bag par bya ba'i phyir slong ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob ni/rnam
362a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yon nam/dor ba
362a4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/dor po med pa stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i//
362a5('bum): phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/dor ba med pa stong po nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
362a6('bum): po yin nam/rlung bzhin stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yon nam/rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dod chags da
362a7('bum): bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
362b1('bum): panyid du slob pa yin nam/rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/chos thams cad stong pa nyid zad par bya/
362b2('bum): ba'i phyir skyob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yon nam/chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
362b3('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/chos thams cad stong pa nyid
362b4('bum): mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
362b5('bum): du slob pa yin na mau/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/rang gi mtshon nyid
362b6('bum): stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nem/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams/
362b7('bum): tud mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nas/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/mi dmigs pa stong

363b1('bum): bya'i phyir sle na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du/

363b3('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gag par bya ba'i phyir sgrub na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi skye bar bya
363b4('bum): pa'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/dran pa bor bzhag po ba ni zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
363b5('bum): yin nam/dran pa nye bar bya zhag pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral dar bye ba'i byed slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon pa yin nam/dran pa nye bar bzhig
363b6('bum): ni 'gag par bye ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad pakhyen pa nyid du slo blo yin nam/drin pa nye bar bzhig pa de ni mi skye bar dwa chub ni/rnam pa rnams kyang
363b7('bum): na pa nyid du slob pa yin nos/yang dag par spong badzin 'da'i byo ni phyi m+bu ra/rnam pa thams pa man pa nyid rje brim pa'on nus/yang dag par
364a1('bum): kha ba ni 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'gag
364a2('bum): par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/yang dag par spong ba ban mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
364a3('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang po bzhi zad par bye ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob po yin nam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
364a4('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyi re slob na/rnam pa thamaso cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam/

364a6('bum): dbang po lnga zad por bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sgrub pa yin namo/dbang po lnga 'dod chags dri grol bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam

364b1('bum): skyo bar bya ba'i phyir spyob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/stobs lnga zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin/

364b6('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob mo/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob po yin nam/'phags pa'i lam yon lag brgyad pa zad par bya ba'i

365b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/tshad med pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slong na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/tshad med pa bzhi

365b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/tshad med pa bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nom/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
365b4('bum): 'jug pa bzhi zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin napa/gzugaso med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'dod chags dang bral bar bya
365b5('bum): ba'i phyir slob na/rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
365b6('bum): pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid du slob pa yin nam/rnam par
365b7('bum): thar pa bachad zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob po yin nom/rnam par thar pa ngargyad 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/
366a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du skyob pa yin nam/rnam par thar pa brgyad 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin//
366a2('bum): nam/rnam pa thar pa brgyad mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
366a3('bum): zad par bya ba'i phyir slob no/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sleb pa yin nam/mtha kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir
366a4('bum): slob na/rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob po yin+da nA ma/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad
366a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin na mo/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir slob ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin
366a6('bum): na mo/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid du slob pa yin nama?/rnam
366a7('bum): /re ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtsha ma med pa dang /smon pa spyod pa rgya gyis drang byol byor gyi ba'i phyi na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi rje
366b1('bum): pa yin nam/rnam par thar pA'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma mod pa dang /smon pa med pa 'gag par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin

367a1('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin+da na ma/gzungs kyi sgo rnams zad par bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob
367a2('bum): pa yin nam/gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir slob na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du slob pa yin nam/gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'gag

373b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/spang ba 'am//skye ba 'am/'dag par 'gyur rama?/dngos du med de'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid gang yin/
373b2('bum): pab de zad pa'am/spang ba'am/skye ba 'am/'gabla bar 'gyur rA ma/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/spang ba'am/skye ba'am/'gag/
373b3('bum): par 'gyur ram/yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/spang ba 'am/skye ba 'am/'gag par 'gyur ram/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i de bzhin
373b4('bum): nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/spang ba'am/skye bu'am/'gag par 'gyur ram/dbang po lnga'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/spang ba'am/skye ba 'am/'gag
373b5('bum): par 'gyur ram/stobs lnga'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/spang ba'am/skye ba 'am/'gag par 'gyur ram/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi de bzhin nyid gang
373b6('bum): yin pa de zad pa'am/spang ba 'am/skye ba 'am/'gag par 'gyur ramA/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa 'am/spang ba 'am/
373b7('bum): pa'am/'gag par 'gyur ram/'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/spang ba 'am/skye ga na/'gag par 'gyur ram/bsam gtan
374a1('bum): bzhi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/sgra pa 'am/skye ba 'am/'gag par 'gyur rAma?/tshad med pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa/
374a2('bum): 'am/spang ba 'am/skye ba'am/'gag par 'gyur ram/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/sbyang ba 'am/skye ba 'a/
374a3('bum): 'gag par 'gyur ra mo/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid dang yin pa de zad pa'am/spang ba'am/skye ba 'am/'gag par 'gyur ram/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
374a4('bum): bar 'jug pa dbu'i de bzhin nyid grang yin pa de zad pa'am/spang ba'am/skye ba'am/'gag par 'gyur ram/rnam par thar pa'i blo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa
374a5('bum): dang /smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/srung ba'am/skye ba'am/'juphra bar 'gyur ram/mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
374a6('bum): de zad pa'i ma/snang ba 'am/skye ba 'am/'dag par 'gyur ram/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/spang ba 'am/smra ba'am/'ogag par 'byung
374a7('bum): ma gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/spang ba 'am/skye ba 'am/'gag par 'gyur ram/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rdo bo ni/
374b1('bum): nyi dang yin pa de zlad pa'am/snang ba ma/sto ba'am/'brug byang 'bru ram/mi 'jigs pa zhi'i do zhon nyid dang yin pa de zad pa'am/spang ba'am/skye ba'am/byug/
374b2('bum): pa 'gyur ram/seMs yang dag par rig po bzhi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byu pa 'am/snar bu'am/smye ng+ge'im/'gag pa myur ra/snying rje chen pa 'di bzhin nyid ga
374b3('bum): yin pa de zad pa'am/spang ba'am/skye babyug 'ang brung pa rgyu /sa makyi chos ma 'dres bad kyi bzhin nyid gang yin pade zad pa'is/skyeng bya glu sgyu ba'i
374b4('bum): 'grug par 'gyur ram/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras kyi de bzhin nyid dang yin pa 'ad ga/nga 'bru skye ba'i blo 'dug par 'gyur rnam/len cig ra 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i
374b5('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bang po 'am/sbyang ba'ig masan nyid dang yin pa dazang po'am/snang bya ma/
374b6('bum): 'gag par 'gyur ma/dgra pacom pa nyid cide zhin nyid dang yin ze de zung dro'os/spang ba'i rgyu/skye ba'ig/'jig par 'gyur ram rang byang chu de bzhin
374b7('bum): gang yin pa de zad pa'am/spang ba'ang/skye ba 'gro/'gag par 'gyur ram/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi bzhin nyid gang yin padi zad pa'amo/spang ba'am/sbyong/
375a1('bum): 'am/'gag par 'gyur ram/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de zad pa'am/spang ba'am/skyo ba'am/'grag par 'gyur ram/
375a2('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma legs so//bde bar gshegs pa de ni mA lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
375a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid la slob pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/de bzhin nyid ni zad pa 'am/spang ba'am/skye ba 'am/'gag por 'gyur ba med de//
375a4('bum): rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin nyid la slob pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i
375a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar skyob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni tshul khrims kyi
375a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i
375a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam
375b1('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa
375b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yini/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyi stong pa nyid la skyob pa yin/rab 'byor
375b3('bum): de ltar skyob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bye ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni stong pa nyid stong pa
375b4('bum): nyid la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chen po stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems
375b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don drim pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob pa
375b6('bum): yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob po'i byang chub sems dpa'
375b7('bum): sems dpa' tshon po ni mtha' las 'ongs pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de lhor slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' semos dpa' chen po ni thog me dang tha ma med pa
376a1('bum): stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/rab 'byor//
376a2('bum): de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon
376a3('bum): po ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin//
376a4('bum): rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
376a5('bum): chen po ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de
376a6('bum): ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
376a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni yang dag par spong
376b1('bum): bani la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar sprob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byung
376b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po ni dbang po lnga la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni stobs lnga la slob po yin//
376b3('bum): rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub kyi yan lab bdun la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
376b4('bum): semasngo dpa' chen po ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'phags pa'i bden
376b5('bum): pa bzhi la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gau tan bzhi la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byung
376b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chud med po bzhi la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs med
376b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin/rang
377a1('bum): 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/rab 'byar
377a2('bum): de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la slob pa yin/rab 'byor//
377a3('bum): de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par shes pa rnams la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
377a4('bum): dpa' chen po ni ting nge 'dzin rnams la slab pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob pa yin/rab
377a5('bum): 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
377a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po niso so yang dag par rog pa bzhi la sla ba
377a7('bum): pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
377b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad lnga slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rgyun du
377b2('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob pa yin/rab 'byor
377b3('bum): de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
377b4('bum): chen po ni dgra bcom pa nyid la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rang byang chub la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de
377b5('bum): ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
377b6('bum): dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bslab pa thams cad kyi
377b7('bum): pha rol tu byin pa 'thob par 'gyur po yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po ni bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis pham
378a1('bum): par ma nus pa yin/rab 'byor da myur rlob pa'i byang chub sems du 'asams dang 'chen byin myur du byor mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa yin/rab
378a2('bum): de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag go de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la spyod pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems
378a3('bum): dpa' sems dpo' chen po ni mgon du 'gyur ba'i chos rnams la slob pa yin/rab 'byor do ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po ni byams pa
378a4('bum): chen po la slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la slob po yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
378a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems
378a6('bum): can+da yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir slong ba yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam par bcu gnyis lan gsum du bsgo ba/
378a7('bum): ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad yongs su /
378b1('bum): par bya'o zhes slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mi chad pa'i phyir slob pa yin/
378b2('bum): rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' semos dpa' chen po ni 'chi ba med pa'i sgo dbye bar bya'o zhes slob pa yin/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub
378b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dus byas kyi khams bstan par bya'o zhes slob pa yin to/rab 'byor sems can dma' bas ni bslab pa rgya chen po 'di la bslab
378b4('bum): par mi nus so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni sems can thams cad 'khor ba las gdon par 'dod pa ste/rab 'byor de ltar slob
378b5('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can dmyal bar mi skye'o//byol song gi skye gnas su mi skye'o//gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi skye'o//yul mtha' 'khob tu mi
378b6('bum): skye'o//srel gcong rong can du mi skye'o//phyag dar ba dang /dadol pa'i rigs su myi skye'o//zhar bar mI 'gyur ro//skur bar mi 'gyur ro//zhibar mi 'gyur ro//yan lag skyon
378b7('bum): don du mi 'gyur ro//'on par mi 'gyur ro//lag pa med par mi 'gyur ro//dbang po dang mi ldan par mi 'gyur te/dbang po yongs su tshang zhing dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro//
379a1('bum): srog gcod par mi 'gyur ro//ma byin par len par mi 'gyur ro//'dod pas log par ga yem par mi 'gyur ro//brdzun du smra bar mi 'gyur ro//phra ma can du /
379a2('bum): 'gyur ro//zhe gcod pa smra bar mi 'gyur ro//tshig bkyal pa can du mi 'gyur ro//chags sems can du mi 'gyur ro//gnod sems can du mi 'gyur ro//ldog par lta bar mi 'gyur
379a3('bum): ro/'tsho ba log pas 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro//yang dag pa ma yin pas yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro//tshul khrims ngan pa can du mi 'gyur ro//tshul khrims ngan pa yongs su
379a4('bum): 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na'i b+ha tshe rings po'i nang du mi skye'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/thabs mkhas pa dang
379a5('bum): ldan pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha tshe rings por mi skye ba'i thabs mkhas pa de lta bu de la yod de/de'ang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
379a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las thabs mkhas pa bstan te/thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam
379a7('bum): gtan rnams la snyoms por 'jug/tshad med pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la snyoms par 'jug ste/bsam gtan dang //
379b1('bum): tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dbang gis kyang mi skye'o//rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na 'di lta ste/
379b2('bum): nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba'i dri ma yongs su dag pas/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi stobs yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/
379b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa lags na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang gi stobs yongs su dag pa 'thob par
379b4('bum): 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin
379b5('bum): gyi yongs su dag pa ste/rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
379b6('bum): sems zhum pa med cing 'gong po med pa de ni rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis ni chos nyid de mi shos mi mthong bas/sems
379b7('bum): can de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
380a1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/nang stong pa nyid la spyod/phyi stong pa nyid
380a2('bum): la spyod/phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/chen po stong pa nyid la spyod/dono dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod/'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
380a3('bum): la spyod/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod//
380a4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod/dran pa
380a5('bum): nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la spyod/yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkeng pa bzhi la spyod/dbang po lnga la spyod/stobs lnga la spyod/byang chub kyi yani lag bdun la spyod/
380a6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan log brgyad pa la spyod/'phags po'i bden pa bzhi la spyod/bsam gtan bzhi la spyod/tshad mod pa bzhi la spyod/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
380a7('bum): bzhi la spyod/rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dbu la spyod/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa
380b1('bum): la spyod/mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod/ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyad/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod/mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod/sa
380b2('bum): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod/byams pa chen po la spyod/snying rje chen po la spyod/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spod/lan
380b3('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la skyong /dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod /rang byang chub la spyod/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod/rnam pa thams cad
380b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid la spyod de/rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad kyi stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa nyid rab tu thob par 'gyur te/nyan thos
380b5('bum): dang rong sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo //rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dang /g.yo ba rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
380b6('bum): par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sa chen po'i phyogs gang na dzam+bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi sa le sbam 'byung ba de lta bu ni ches rung ngo //rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste/shes rab
380b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la slob pa'i sems can de lta bu'ang rung ste/sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas chos med //
381a1('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sems can gang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs te gnas pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/sems can gang khams kyi
381a2('bum): rgyal phran du 'gyur ba'i las yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa de lta bu ni ches mang ngo //rab 'byor de bzhin du sems can dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'dir 'jug pa de lta bu'ang nyung
381a3('bum): ste/sems can gang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bas kyang ches mang ngo //rab 'byor dang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
381a4('bum): ngo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag pas ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de lta bu ches nyung ngo //
381a5('bum): de bas kyang sems can gang nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas su gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu ni chos mang ngo //rab 'byor gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs
381a6('bum): kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod cing /the tshom med par phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon po de dag pas ni/gang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnor bar 'gyur ba de lta bu
381a7('bum): ches mang ngo //rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'dod pa dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i ser chud par 'dod pas/shes rab
381b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ser sku dang ldan pa
381b2('bum): sems mi skye'o//tshul khrims ngan pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyo'o//'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//le lo dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//g.yeng ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//
381b3('bum): shes rab 'chal pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//tho ba dang /
381b4('bum): ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//tsher bye dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//'du shes dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//'du byed dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//rnam
381b5('bum): par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//mig dang ldan pa'i'o sems mi skye'o//rna ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//sna dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//lho dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//lus dang
381b6('bum): ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//yid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//gzugs dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//sgra dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//dri dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//ro dang ldan pa'i sems
381b7('bum): mi skye'o//reg dang ldan pa'i sems mi rgya'o//chos dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//mig gi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mo skye'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o/
382a1('bum): sngar rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi ste//lce'i rnang par shes pa dang lda pa'i sems mi ste'o//lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems ma
382a2('bum): //ying gyi rnam par shes bu dang ldan pa'i sems myi skye'o//mid gi 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//rna ba'i 'dus te rib b+ha dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//
382a3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i semasem skye'o//lho'i 'dus te dgro ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//rnyed kyi 'dus
382a4('bum): rig pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//
382a5('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
382a6('bum): ba dang ldan pa'i sems mo skye'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//sa'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//tshu'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems
382a7('bum): mi skye'o//me'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//rlung gi khams dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//nam mkha'i khams dang ldan pa'i sems mo skye'o//rnam par shes pa'i khams dgra
382b1('bum): ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//ma rig pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//'du byed dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//ming dang gzugs dang /
382b2('bum): ldan pa'i sems mo d+h+ya'o//skye mched drug deng ldan pa'i sems mai b+he'o//rig pa dung ldan pa'i sems mi d+hi'o//tshor bya dang ldan pa'i snrums mi ste'o//sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi
382b3('bum): /len pa dang ldan pa'i sems mo skyer//sring ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi spro'o//skye ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyelo /rga shrI dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye//sbyin pa'i pha
382b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi rgyu'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi rgya'o//brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye//brtson 'grus
382b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yesras mi skye'o//byas ma gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dung ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//
382b6('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//byi spyod pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//byin du stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i seMn sa mi skye'o//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
382b7('bum): sems mi skye'o//chen po stong pa nyid dang ldan po'i sems mi skye'o//don dam pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems rje sbyig/dus byas stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi
383a1('bum): skye'o//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//thog ma dang tha ma med pa
383a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang
383a3('bum): ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang ldan
383a4('bum): pa'i sems mi skye'o//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang ldan pa'i
383a5('bum): sems mi skye'o//yang dag par spong ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyo'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//dbang po dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//stobs dang ldan
383a6('bum): pa'i sems mi skye'o//byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i sdems mi skye'o//'phags pa'i lamu yan lhag brgyad pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//'phags pa'i badren pa dang ldan
383a7('bum): pa'i sems mi skye'o//bsam gtan dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//
383b1('bum): rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa
383b2('bum): dang /smon pa med pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//gzungs kyi sgo dang ldan pa'i sems
383b3('bum): mi skye'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//so so yang dag par rig pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//
383b4('bum): byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'das pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
383b5('bum): 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//dgra bcom pa
383b6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//rlung byang chub dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
383b7('bum): ldan pa'i sems mi skye'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di le spyod pa'i tshe/chos gang
384a1('bum): yang dmigs pa med de/ma dmigs pas chos gang la'ang sems bskyed pa med do//rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i
384a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongasu su zin par 'gyur ro//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus par 'gyur ro//pha rol tu phyin
384a3('bum): po thams cad dang mthun par spyod par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so//rob
384a4('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na 'jig tshogs su lta bar lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis po thams cad kyang 'dus pa yin te/rab 'byor de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha
384a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur pa'i 'tsho ba'i dbang po 'gags pas/dbang po thams cad 'gags pa rA
384a6('bum): 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pas/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus pa yin
384a7('bum): te rab 'byor de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab
384b1('bum): par bya'o//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na/sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa la slob pa yin no//rab
384b2('bum): 'byor de ji snyam du sems/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag mang ba yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //
384b3('bum): byede bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams kyang mang ba lags na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta
384b4('bum): smos kyang ci 'tshal/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji skad pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par
384b5('bum): mi'i lus thob par gyur te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad re re la'ang /sku tshe'i
384b6('bum): mthar phyin gyi bar du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun mi 'chad par/na bza' dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzims cha dang /snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /yo byad mang
384b7('bum): pos bsnyen bkur byas na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
385a1('bum): snang ngo //de 'a sa shegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bas nang rigs kyi gru la rigs kyi bum gang shes/
385a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin d+hi 'chung ba dang /klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /de bzhin nyid du nan+ya tan byed na/
385a3('bum): de'i bsod nams chos mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/de ltar ngan
385a4('bum): chen por 'gyur ba ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub pa'o//rab 'byor de bsan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams
385a5('bum): cad kyi blan med par 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /sems can mngon med pa thams cad kyi mgron du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur bar 'dod
385a6('bum): pa dang /gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /long ba rnams kyi mig tu 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang /mun par gnas pa rnams kyi sgron mar 'gyur
385a7('bum): bar 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba 'thob par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pas rnam par
385b1('bum): bar 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i nga ro bsdug par 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi rnga brdung bar 'dod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi dung 'bud par 'dod pa dang /sangs
385b2('bum): rgyas kyi gtam bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par bya'o//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems
385b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni phun sum tshogs pa gang thob par bya ba de dag las mi thob pa gang yang med do//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
385b4('bum): kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des thob par bgyi ba lags sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang nges 'thob par bgyi ba lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
385b5('bum): sbal pa/rab 'byor nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des 'thob par bya/rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa'ang des 'thob par bya ste/de la gnas par mi bya/'dug
385b6('bum): par mi bya'i shes pa dang /mthong bas de dag mthong bar bya ste/'da' bar bya/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud par bya'o//rab 'byor de ltar skyob pa'i byang chub sems
385b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs por 'tshang
386a1('bum): rgya'o//rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/lnga dang /mi dang /lta ba yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/
386a2('bum): sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba yin te/rab 'byor de ltar spong pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/de ma yin pa sbyin pa'i gnas nyan thos dang /ra
386a3('bum): sangs rgyas grang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan cing 'gro bar gyur pa yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin/rab 'byor de
386a4('bum): ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi gtong zhing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/shes rab
386a5('bum): kya pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba'o//rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po ni rnam pa
386a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su mi nyam pa'i cho snga can du rig par byas te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyis ring du byed cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
386a7('bum): ba'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa yin/gal te yang 'di snyam du 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//shes ra gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la'o//shes ra kyi pha
386b1('bum): tu phyin pa 'dis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub par bya'o snyam ste/gal te de ltar shes nA shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//gal te 'di ni shes rab
386b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di na yod do zhes bya bar shes pa med de/gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang /gang gis
386b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ba dang /gong shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas byung ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
386b4('bum): 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'ang mi shes mi mthong zhing /de 'di snyam ste/chos kyi dbyings dang /de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' gnas pa'i phyir/'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol
386b5('bum): tu byin pa'ang ma yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na yod pa'ang ma yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis ni chos gang yang 'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang med
386b6('bum): do zhes/rab 'byor de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
386b7('bum): stong phrag brgya pa las/le'u bzhi bcu rtsa 'dun pa'o////de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/'di la byang chub sems
387a1('bum): dash+ya sems dpa'achen du ston pa'i ro du phyin pa dang /tshul khris TI pha rol tu phyinang dang /brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /na
387a2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gau tan gyi pha rol rgyu byin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang spyod/nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa
387a3('bum): nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo /chen po stong pa nyid dang /den ngom pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong po nyid dang /
387a4('bum): 'dus lta ng+yas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /drug mi drang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stongo bo nyid dang /rlung bzhin
387a5('bum): pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
387a6('bum): du nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid la 'ong spyod/dz+nyAn pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dge bar spong ba bzhi da /rdzu phrul gyi rkang
387a7('bum): bzhi dag dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /bya chub kyi yan lag 'dun dpa' nis pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pa la'ang stsapa'aphegs pa'i badzin pa bzhi dang khas ma /
387b1('bum): /nang rlung ba na dpa/gzugs rnyeng pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa byin la'ang spyod/rnam sbyar thar pa brgyad dang /mapar myis gnas pa snyoms par 'jug pa dgung ga
387b2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i ste stong pa nyid dang /mtshani ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams la'ang spyod/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzung
387b3('bum): ske rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen
387b4('bum): dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa btsa di rgyud la'ang spyod bzhin du/sems can thams cad zil gyis non+da na/bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
387b5('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur naste ce smos/sems cani gang gi sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa de dag kyang thob pa legs par spro 'o /
387b6('bum): dgrag 'tsha ba legs par 'tsho ba yin na/gang gis bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod pa dag hU~M spros/sems can gang gis yang dag par rdzogs
387b7('bum): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa de dag ni/kun gyis yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin no//kun gyis yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin na snyam
388a1('bum): nas/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis me tog man+da ra ba mang po blangs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nus/me tog man+da ra ba de dang /
388a2('bum): gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to//mngon par gtor to//rab tu gtor to//de ltar gtor te mngon
388a3('bum): par gtor ba dang /rab tu gtor bar byas nas/tshig 'di skad du brjod do//dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis bla na med
388a4('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dmigs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi//
388a5('bum): chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/rang byung gi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/zag pa med pa'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par
388a6('bum): gyur cig/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa sngar ldog
388a7('bum): per 'gyur bar sems 'ga' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slang log ste/nyen thos
388b1('bum): sam/rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar sems 'gru' tsam yang skye ba ma mchis kyi/bla na med pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myos pa bskyed cing /yang
388b2('bum): dang yang du bla na medo pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa dang /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mang po 'di dag mthong nas/lha dang mi dang //

389a4('bum): kyo bu mo de'i bsod nams ji tsam zhig tu 'phel brla 'gyur/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces
389a5('bum): bka' stsal to//kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni sgra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/de dag gi rjes su yi rang
389a6('bum): bA dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do//kau shr-i ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang /

389b1('bum): skra'i rtse mo'i tshad kyis tshad gzung bar rung yang srid kyi/de dag gi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sdom sa bskyed pa'i bsod nams la ni tshad med do//kau shi ka stong

390a1('bum): bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phros pa'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom

392a3('bum): de ni ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das snu ma dang sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gud ni chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par

395a6('bum): shin tu dben pa'o//rab 'byor ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben po dang /brtson
