395b3('bum): pa dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /
395b4('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /rang gi mtshan nyid
395b5('bum): stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin
395b6('bum): tu dben pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhags pa rnams shin tu dbyen pa dang /yang dag par spong ba
395b7('bum): rnams shin tu dben pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /dbang po rnams shin tu dben pa dang /stobs rnams shin tu dben pa dang /byed
396a1('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams shin tu draben pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu dben pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
396a2('bum): shrin tu dben pa dang /bsam gtan rnams shin tu dben pa dang /tshad med pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
396a3('bum): shin tu dben pa dang /rnam par thar pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /rnam par thar
396a4('bum): pA'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa shin tu dben pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams
396a5('bum): shin tu dben pa dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu dben pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shin tu dben pa dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi shin tu dben
396a6('bum): pa dang /so so yang dag par rigs bzhi shin tu dben pa dang /byams pa chen po shin tu dben pa dang /snying rje chen po shin tu dben pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos
396a7('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shin tu dben pa dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang /phyir
396b1('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /rang byang chub shin tu dben pa dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang //
396b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu dben pa de bzhin du/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang shin tu dben pa'o//rab
396b3('bum): 'byor gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
396b4('bum): shin tu dben par ma gyur/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben par ma gyur/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
396b5('bum): shin tu dben par ma gyur/nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/phyi stong pa nyid shin tu dben par mi gyur/phyi nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/stong
396b6('bum): pa nyid stod pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/chen po stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/de na dam pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/'dus byas stong pa nyid
396b7('bum): shin tu dben par ma gyur/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par mi gyur/thog ma dang tha ma med pa
397a1('bum): d+hA ba TI shin dren par mAr+d+ha pA/dor du med pa spyong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma sbyar/rlung nan ba na n+da pAr m+b+ha b+h+ram+mA
397a2('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/dngos po med
397a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben par mi gyur/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/dran
397a4('bum): nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/yang dag par sbyong ba rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shin tu dben par ma
397a5('bum): gyur/dbang po rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/stobs rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/'phags
397a6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu dben par mi gyur/'phags pa'i bdun pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/bsam gtan rnams shin tu dben par ma
397a7('bum): gyur/tshad med pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/gzugs med pa'i rnams par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/rnam par thar tshed rnams shin tu
397b1('bum): sa d+yam+mA byar chu gnas pa'i rnams par 'a gyu nas na dpon pa sa pa rnam ngad dang /na su myeng badrun
397b2('bum): napa snad shA dben par mthur/ shes na shin tu de ts+tsha mu / na rna na na ma gyur/su
397b3('bum): rnams shin tu dben pa ma gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgrings rnam sa shin tu dben pa ma b+hU marje 'jigs zla rna ma'i shin sa dben par mgyur/ma se ma
397b4('bum): dbye par rig pa rnams shin tu dben par ma gyur/byams pa chen po shin tu dben parna me b+haro/snying rje chen po shin tu dben par me b+hur/sangs rgyas
397b5('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad shin tu dben par ma gyuraro/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shin tu dben par mi gyur/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu den
397b6('bum): b+har ma gyur/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben par ma gyur/dgra bcom pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/rang byung chu bo shin tu dben phyur ma thu ru la
397b7('bum): kyi rnam pa shes po nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin tu dben par ma gyur na/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro//
398a1('bum): de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro//de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro//de brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur/
398a2('bum): de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro//de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro//de nang stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//de phyi stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//
398a3('bum): de phyi nang stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//de chen po stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//de don dam pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//de
398a4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//de 'dus mi byas stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//dri mtha' las 'dasde pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//de thog ma dang tha ma med
398a5('bum): pastong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//de dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//de rang bzhin stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//de chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur
398a6('bum): /de rang gri mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//de ngo
398a7('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//de dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro//de yang dang/
398b1('bum): par spong ba rnams su mi 'gyur ro//de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro//de dbang po rnams su mi 'gyur ro//de stobs rnams su mi 'gyur ro//de byang
398b2('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams su mi 'gyur ro//de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud par mi 'gyur ro//de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro//dri bsam gtan rnams
398b3('bum): su mi 'gyur ro//de tshad med pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro//de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro//de rnam par thar pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro//de mthar
398b4('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro//de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan mA med pa dang /smon pa med par mi 'gyur ro//
398b5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams su mi 'gyur ro//de ting nge 'dzin rnams su mi 'gyur ro//de gzungs kyi sgo rnams su mi 'gyur ro//de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu /
398b6('bum): mi 'gyur ro//de mi 'jigs pa bzhir mi 'gyur ro//de so so yang dag par rig pa bzhir mi 'gyur ro//de byams pa chen por mo 'gyur ro//de snying rje chen por mi
398b7('bum): 'gyur ro//de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du mi 'gyur ro//de rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro//de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur
399a1('bum): ro/de spyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro//de dgra bcom pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//de rang byung chub tu myi 'gyur ro//de lam gyi rnam pa shes
399a2('bum): ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro//de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bas na ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang /
399a3('bum): ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
399a4('bum): shin tu dben po dang /ji ltar tshul khrims kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar rlung
399a5('bum): ba nyid shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu
399a6('bum): dben pa dang /ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar dron dmo pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben+da pa dang /ji ltar 'dus byas stong bya nyid shin tu
399a7('bum): dben pa dang /ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar thog pa dang tham
399b1('bum): med pa sbyong ba nyid shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar dor ba rmed pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar chos thams cad
399b2('bum): stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar dngos po med
399b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar
399b4('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /
399b5('bum): ji ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar stobs rnams shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar 'phags
399b6('bum): pA'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar 'phags pa'i badren pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar bsam gtan+da rnams shin tu dben pa dang /
399b7('bum): ji ltar tshad med pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar rnam par thar pa rnams
400a1('bum): shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
400a2('bum): ba nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams
400a3('bum): shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar mi 'jigs
400a4('bum): pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar byams pa chen po shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar snying rje chen
400a5('bum): shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang /
400a6('bum): ji ltar lan+da cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shin tu dbeni pa dang /ji ltar dgra bcom pa nyid shin tu dben
400a7('bum): pa dang /ji ltar rang byang chub shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid shin tu dben pa dang /ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid shin
400b1('bum): tu dben pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya/dper
400b2('bum): pas dben pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong mi rgya ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyu bas na shes rab kyi pha rol
400b3('bum): tu phyin pa la ma brten par mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi rgya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab mo la spyod pa'o///
400b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don zab mo la spyod pa'o//
400b5('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar don zab mo la spyod cing /'di lta ste/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'byur ba'i don du mngon
400b6('bum): du mi byed po de ni dka' ba byed pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis grosungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba lhu rA na/dka' ba cung zad kyang myi bgyid na/ji ltar
400b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' semos dpa' chen po dka' ba bgyed pa lags/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang mngon du bgyi ba'i don de'ang mi dmigs
401a1('bum): gang gis mngon du bgyi ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs/gang mngon du bgyi ba'i chos de'ang mi dmigs te/bcom ldan
401a2('bum): 'dras chos thams cad gang mngon du bgyis pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i don mngon du
401a3('bum): bgyi ba de lta bu'ang grang zhig mchis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gang zhig gis mngon du bgyi/chos mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu'ang gang zhig mchis/bcom
401a4('bum): ldan 'das 'di ni mi dmigs pa'i spyod pa ste/de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mun pa ma mchis pa 'thob pa'o//
401a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te de skad du bstan pa la byang chubo sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'dzum yongs su mi 'dzum zhing mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag
401a6('bum): par mi 'gyur na/bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/de ni spyod do zhes
401a7('bum): bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
401b1('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o zhes bgyi bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
401b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni 'di snyam du bdag gis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni bsring bar bya ste/badrug ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur to
401b3('bum): snyam yang mi bgyid do//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkhra' ni 'di ltar bdag ni lo la dang ni ring ngo //la lnga dang ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so//
401b4('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' la bye brag ma mchis shing /mi g.yo ba dang rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
401b5('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang 'di ltar bdag las nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring gi blam
401b6('bum): mo pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi snyoms so//de ci'i slad du zhe ni/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa
401b7('bum): slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni 'di ltar bdag las sgyu ma ni rang ngo //sgyu ma'i mkhan po ni nye'o//skye bo'i tshogs 'di ltar 'dus pa ni
402a1('bum): bdag las ring pon 'am/1zhes 'gyi bar mi mas su//de ci'i skad du na na/ma ldan 'das sgyu ma'i sgros ku ni rnam par mo rtag pa'i snang durmA
402a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das dri bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rnon po shes rab rol tu phyin bu la spyod pa 'dzi/'di ltar bdag las nyan thos sam/
402a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo //bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bor mi sems so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
402a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i spyad du'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/gzugs brnyan ni 'di ltar bdag la sa dmigs pa gang gis gzugs
402a5('bum): brnyan byung ba de ni nye/gang ma long dang snod chus gang ba'i nang du byung ba de ni badra ga las ring ngo zhes bgyi bar mi sems so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das
402a6('bum): gzugs brnyan rnam par mi rtog pa'i srid dri ste/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
402a7('bum): pa'ang 'di ltar bdag las nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyis ni ring ngo //tha na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi semos so//de
402b1('bum): ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni sdug pa dang mi
402b2('bum): sdug pa ma mchis so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gang gis 'di la sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa'i slang du'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di
402b3('bum): lce ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ni sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba gang yang ma mchis so//bcom ldan
402b4('bum): 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba gang yang ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs
402b5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
402b6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi
402b7('bum): rtog pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni 'di ltar nga las nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni ring ngo //bran
403a1('bum): med du yang dad par rdzogs pa'i drang chung ni nye zhes dbyi bar mi dgongs so//de ci'i slad du she na/bcom ldan 'das de bdun gshegs pa dang /
403a2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa rnam par mi rtog po'i slad du ste/bcom ldan+da 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa
403a3('bum): spyod pa'ang 'di ltar bdag las nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyab kyi sa ni ring ngo //bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni nye'o zhes bgyi bar mi sems so//de
403a4('bum): ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/de bzhin gshegs pas
403a5('bum): sprul pa zhog sprul pa mdzad na/de ni don gang gi slad du sprul pa de'i don sbyor te/sprul pa ni mi rtod rnam par mi rtog go/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes ra
403a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang don gang gi slad du brjod pa'i don de'ang bgyid de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni mi rtogra rnam par mi rtog pa'o//bcom ldan 'das rin
403a7('bum): lha ste dper na/shing mkhan nam/shing mkhan kye slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis bud med kyi gzugs sam/skyes pa'i gzugs sam/glang po'i gzugs sa mi
403b1('bum): tshocho bas rta'i gzugs sam/glang gi gzugs kyi 'khrul 'khor zhig sbyar na/de don gang gi skad du bgyis pa'i don de sgrub kyang 'khrul 'khor de ni rnam par mi rtog go//bcom
403b2('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang don gang gi skad du brjod pa'i don de bgyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o//de nas
403b3('bum): che dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bra' zhig rnam par mi rtog
403b4('bum): pa yin nam/'on te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin po'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin/'on te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin/'on te bzod
403b5('bum): pA'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin/'on te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin/'on te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par
403b6('bum): mi rtog pa yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang
403b7('bum): rnam par mi rtog pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu/
404a1('bum): byin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o//smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor TI kanags kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/tshu bya'ang rnam par mi rtog pa
404a2('bum): yin nam/'du shes kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/'du byed kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog bla yin nam/mig kyang
404a3('bum): rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/rna ba 'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/sku'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin num/lce'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin+da nam/lus kyang rnam
404a4('bum): par mi rtog pa yin nam/yid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/gzugs kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/sgyu 'di rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/dri'ang rnam
404a5('bum): par mi rtog pa yin nam/ro 'dra rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/reg kyang rnam bAr+ya mi rtog pa yin nam/chos kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/myig gi rnam
404a6('bum): shes pa 'di rnam par mi rtog pa yin+da nam/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/sku'i rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/
404a7('bum): rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nas/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin na ma/yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'ang rnam par mi
404b1('bum): phyin nam/mig gi 'dus te rebu pa'ang rnam par mi rtog bya yin nam/rna ba'i 'dus te rog pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/sgra'i 'dus te reg pa'ang rnam par
404b2('bum): rtog pa n+d+ha nAH/dus te reg du'ang dang par mi rtog pa mi nan mA~M/pus kyi dus te rig pa'ang rnab par mi rtog pa yin nam/yid kyi 'dus tu reg pa'ang
404b3('bum): rnam par mi rtog pa yin namo/mig gi 'dus te dag pa lang rgyu ba'i tshor ba du na sna bye mi rtog pa yin nas/na du'i 'dus te reg pa lus byung ba'i chang 'dun
404b4('bum): par myi rtog pa yin nam/sku'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'adra rnam par mi rtog pa yin+da na/kye'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i char bi'ang rnam par ma chug
404b5('bum): payin nas/lus kyi 'dus reg pa las byung ba ba'ang rnam par mi d+hizla bya yin nAm/yid kyi 'jus te rig pa las tshir ba nga rnam par mi rtog pa yin nas/
404b6('bum): sa kham swA g+hAng+tha rnam b+har me rtog pa yin nam/chu'i khams kyang rnam par myi rtog pa yin nam/mo'i khrims kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/rlung gA khams kya
404b7('bum): rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/rnam mapal khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/rnam shes pa'i khams kyi rnam par mi smyin med nam/ma rigs
405a1('bum): rnam byar mi rtog pa yin nam/'du byed kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ming dang gzugs kyang
405a2('bum): rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/skye mched drug kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin na ma/reg pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/tshor ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/
405a3('bum): sred pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ldan pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/srid pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/skye ba'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam//
405a4('bum): rga shi'ang rnam par myi rtog pa yin nam/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog
405a5('bum): pA yin nam/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin po'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/bsam gtan
405a6('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam+b+ha/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rnyog
405a7('bum): yin nam/phyi stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog
405b1('bum): ljin nam/chen po stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nama?/don dam po stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa
405b2('bum): yin nam/'dus ma d+his stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
405b3('bum): nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nama?/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/chos thams
405b4('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin
405b5('bum): nAnam/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
405b6('bum): nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/dran pa nye bur bzhag pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin
405b7('bum): nam/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/dbang po rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/stobs rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin du
406a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/'phags
406a2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/bsam gtan rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/tshad med pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam//
406a3('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/rnam par thar pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/mthar gyis gnas pa'i
406a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'ang rnam par mi rtog pa
406a5('bum): yin nam/mngon par shes pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang rnam
406a6('bum): par mi rtog pa yin nam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/so so yang dag
406a7('bum): par rig pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/byams pa chen po'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/snying rje chen po'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/sangs rgyas
406b1('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang rnam par
406b2('bum): ri rtog pa yin nam/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/dgra bcom pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nom/rang byang chub kyang rnam par mi
406b3('bum): rtog pa yin nam/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtag pa yin nam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par mi rtog po yin nam/'dus byas
406b4('bum): khrikhams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/'dus ma byas kyi khams kyang rnam par mi rtog pa yin nam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad
406b5('bum): nirnam par mi rtog pa'o//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te de ltar chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa yin na/sems can dmyal ba dang /byil seng gi skye gnas dang /
406b6('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /lha dang mi'i 'gro ba lngar 'khor ba zhes tha dad du dbye ba ci las 'ongs/rgyun du zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom
406b7('bum): pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su brjod pa'ang ci las gyur/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i /
407a1('bum): sems can gang phyin ci log las byung ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mngon par 'du byed pa de dag 'di lta bu'i skye mched mngon par sgrub ste/las kyi rnam
407a2('bum): par smin pa phung po'i gzhi cen rnam par rtog pa las byung ba yongs su bzung zhing sems can dmyal ba dang /byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /lha
407a3('bum): dang mi'i 'gro ba mngon par sgrub bo//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang khyod kyis 'di skad du/rgyun du zhugs par brjod pa tswi las gyur/lan cig phyir 'ong bar brjod pa ci
407a4('bum): las gyur/phyir mi 'ong bar brjod pa ci las gyur/dgra bcom par brjod pa ci las gyur/rang sangs rgyas su brjod pa ci las gyur/byang chub sems dpar brjod pa ci
407a5('bum): las gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su brjod pa ci las gyur ces zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/rnam par mi rtog/
407a6('bum): pa las rgyun du zhugs par brjod do//rnam par mi rtog pa las rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur brjod do//rnam par mi rtog pa las lan cig phyir 'ong bar brjod do//rnam
407a7('bum): par mi rtog pa las lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur brjod do//rim por mi rtog pa las phyir mi 'ong bar brjod do//rnam par mi rtog pa las phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras chung
407b1('bum): brjod do//rnam par mi rtog pa las dgra bcom par brjod do//rnam par mi rtog pa las dgra bcom pa nyid du brjod do//rnam par mi rtog pa las rang sangs rgyas su brjod de/
407b2('bum): rnam par mi rtog pa las rang byang chub tu brjod do//rnam par mi rtog pa las sangs rgyas su brjod do//rnam par mi rtog pa las byang chub tu brjod do//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
407b3('bum): ti'i bu 'das pa'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang
407b4('bum): rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing rnam par rtog pa spangs par gyur to//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/de bzhi ni gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
407b5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing rnam par rtog pa spangs par 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan
407b6('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu da ltar byung ba'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras dang ji snyed cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
407b7('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing rnam par rtog pa spangs pa sha stag go//de ltar tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
408a1('bum): sa 'a do/ma bdu pa sgrog du song dzadu ldanan nyid dung/yang dag pa'i mtha'i de 'don nyid dang /ma kyi cad bzhin nyid
408a2('bum): rkyen padu byas te/rnam par rtog pa med par rig par d+ha/tshe dang ldan pa shA rA dwa tI'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i rgyun pos de ltar rnam par mi rtog pa
408a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par bya ste/rnam por mi rtog pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par
408a4('bum): 'tshang rgya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po stong phrag brgya pa las/le'u ba'i bcu brtson pa'o///de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i dus/
408a5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//kye mtshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni snying po
408a6('bum): la spyod pa'o//de skad tsas smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dA tI'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//kye ma tshe dang ldan+ta pa shA ra dA ti'i bu byang chub
408a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni snying po med pa la spyod pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
408b1('bum): ni snying po med pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med
408b2('bum): pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni snying po med pa'o//nang stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o//phye stong pa nyid ni snying po
408b3('bum): med pa'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni snying po me pa'o//chen po stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o//don dam pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med
408b4('bum): pa'o//'dus byas stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o//thob ma dang tha ma
408b5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o//rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o//chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni snying po med
408b6('bum): bya'o//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o//mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o//ngo bo nyid stong bya
408b7('bum): nyid ni snying po med pa'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o//yang dag par spang ba rnams ni
409a1('bum): snying po med pa'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o//dbang po rnams ni snying po med pa'o//stobs rnams ni snying po med pa'o//byang chub kyi
409a2('bum): yan lag rnams ni snying po med pa'o//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni snying po med pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o//bsam gtan
409a3('bum): rnams ni snying po med pa'o//tshad med pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o//gzugs med pa'i rloms par 'jug pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o//rnam par thar pa rnams
409a4('bum): ni snying po med pa'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa
409a5('bum): med pa ni snying po med pa'o//mngon par shes pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams ni snying po med pa'o//gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni snying po med pa'o//de bzhin/
409a6('bum): gshegs pU'i stobs rnams ni snying po med pa'o//mi 'jigs pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o//so so yang dag par reg pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o//ma su
409a7('bum): chen po ni snying po med pa'o//snying rje chen po ni snying po med pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni snying po med pa'o//thams cad shes pa nyid ni snying po med/
409b1('bum): 'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni snying po med pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
409b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni snying po med po nyid kyang mi dmigs shing /yang dag por rjes su mi mthong ni/snying po la dmigs pa lta
409b3('bum): ga la yod de nas 'dod pa nA spyod pa dang /gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu shin tu mang ba drug 'di snyam du gyur te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bla na med
409b4('bum): pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ji skad du bstan pa 'di la spyod pa dang /don 'di la spyod kyang yang ///
409b5('bum): dag pa'i mtha' gang mngon du byas pas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur te/yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi bya ba de dag ni phyag bya
409b6('bum): ba'i gnas te rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mnyam pa nyid 'di mngon par mi byed pa de dag ni phyag bya bar 'os pa'o//de nas tshe
409b7('bum): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la ni/chos kyi mnyam pa nyid gang
410a1('bum): bangon du bya bas nyan thos kyi smra'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la snyanas par 'gyur ba de mngon du mi bya ba de ni me dag/sgyu bu dgasams spyan na
410a2('bum): rmed grangs med du bde med pa thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'anga'o zhes go cha bgos la gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i sems can de dag shin tu
410a3('bum): mi dmigs pa ni de dag lnga de bas dka' ste/de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad gdul bar bya'o zhes bla na med
410a4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa yin te/gang sems can gdul byur sems pa de ni nam mkha' gdul bar sems pa dang 'dra'o//de ci'i
410a5('bum): phyir zhen/nam mkha' dngon pa'i phyir sems can dben par byalta'o//nam mkha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems can stong pa nyid du blta'o//nam mkha' snying po med pa'i
410a6('bum): ra sems can snying po med par blta'o//num mtha' gsog gi phyir sems can gsog tu blto'o//lha'i bu dag rnam blangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' ses
410a7('bum): dopa' chen po gang sems can med pa rnams kyi don du go mkhyen pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa ste/gang sems can rnams kyi don du go cha gyo na pa de dag ni nam ma
410b1('bum): smra pa 'a hA/byung chub sams da sams smrad+ma tsu bag tu de 'dra gas la/sos swA R+Wa gang gi sprin du byung nan sems dpa' sems dpa'an
410b2('bum): pos go cha bags pa'i sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs so//ji ci'i phyir zhe ni/sems can dben pa'i phyir gro cha dpon por bsku'o//gal te de ltar durdzun pa'i
410b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bum par mi 'gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//de ci
410b4('bum): phyi zhe na/gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//'du shes dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//'du byed
410b5('bum): dpon pa'i phyir sems can dben du'o//rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//myig dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//rna ba dben pa'i phyir ma/
410b6('bum): can dben pa'o//sku dben pa'i phyir rnams rgyun dben pa'o//skye dben pa'i phyir sems ts+tshanA daden pa'o//lus dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'i//yid dben pa'i phyi
410b7('bum): sems can dben pa'o//gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//sgra dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//dri dben pa'i phyir sems can mdzin pa'o//
411a1('bum): phyir sems can dben pa'o//ga dben pa'i phyir senas nan dben pa'o//chas dpon pa'i phyir sems can dpon pa'o//migag rnam par shes hA/
411a2('bum): dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//lce'i
411a3('bum): rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems cani dben pa'o//lus kyi rnam par shos pa dben pa'i phyir sems cani dben pa'o//nyid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can
411a4('bum): dben pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i
411a5('bum): phyir sems can dben pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg bya dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//yid
411a6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te
411a7('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor po dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshe rab dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//lce'i
411b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//yid kyi
411b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher dra dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can
411b3('bum): dben pa'o//me'i khams dben pa'i phyir semaso can dben pa'o//rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben
411b4('bum): pa'o//rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//'du byed dben pa'i phyir sems can
411b5('bum): dben pa'o//rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir sems
411b6('bum): can dben pa'o//reg pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//tshor ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//sred pa dben pa'i phyir sems can+da dben pa'o//len
411b7('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//srid pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//skye ba dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//rga shi dben pa'i phyir
412a1('bum): sems can dben pa'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i byung //
412a2('bum): sems can dben pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dngon pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben
412a3('bum): pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems cin dben pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//nang stong
412a4('bum): pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//stong pa
412a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can
412a6('bum): dben pa'o//'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//'dus ma byas spong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//mtha' las 'das pa
412a7('bum): stong pa nyid dben po'i phyir sems can dben po'o//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyidi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i
412b1('bum): phyi sems can dben pa'o//rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//rang glu
412b2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir
412b3('bum): sems can dben pa'o//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//dran
412b4('bum): pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//yang dag par sbyong ba bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir
412b5('bum): sems can dben pa'o//dbang po lnga dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//stobs lnga dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dben pa'i
412b6('bum): phyir sems can dben pa'o//zhang gis bu'i la mo yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben
412b7('bum): /byas ma gtan yan dzin pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//tshad med pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
413a1('bum): bani dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//rnam par thar pa brgyad dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//mthar gyis gnas bya'i snyoms par
413a2('bum): 'jug pa dgu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dben pa'i phyir sems can dben
413a3('bum): pa'o//mngon par shes pa rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben pa'i phyir
413a4('bum): sems can dben pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//mi 'jigs pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//
413a5('bum): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//byams pa chen po dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir sems
413a6('bum): can dben pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir semos can
413a7('bum): dben pa'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//ngagra
413b1('bum): bcom pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//rang byang chub dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can
413b2('bum): dben pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'i phyir sems can dben pa'o///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag bo rgya ga//ma
413b3('bum): blo nyes brgya zhe dgu pa//gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dI ben+d+ra pa'o//tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//
413b4('bum): shes dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//'du byed dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//rnam por shes pa dben pa'i
413b5('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//mig dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//rna ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
413b6('bum): dben pa'o//sna dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngon pa'o//lce dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//lus dben pa'i phyir shes
413b7('bum): rakye pha rab tu phyin pa dben pa'o//yid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//gzugs dben po'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po dben pa'o//
414a1('bum): sna dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//dri dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//ro dben pa'i phyir shes
414a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//reg dben pa'i phyir sho sI rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben po'o//chos dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//
414a3('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//
414a4('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//lus
414a5('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
414a6('bum): pa'o//mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinapa
414a7('bum): dben pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//lho'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
414b1('bum): pa dben pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

414b3('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//lce'i 'dus te reg pa las
414b4('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o///
414b5('bum): yod kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//
414b6('bum): chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//me'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//rlung gi khams dben pa'i
414b7('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes
415a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngon pa'o//ma jug pa dpon byaphyi sa pa phyin pa dun nam//'du byed dben pa'i phyir snga rab kyi du
415a2('bum): tu byon pa dben pa'o//rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
415a3('bum): pa'o//rtse mched drug dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//rig pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab
415a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//sred pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//len pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa deben pa'o//
415a5('bum): sbrid pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//skye ba dben po'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//rga shi dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
415a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin po drang nu pa'i phyir
415a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dedaben pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
415b1('bum): phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//shes ra
415b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa da ngan pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//phyi stong pa nyid dben
415b3('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir
415b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab
415b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po dben pa'o//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab
415b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//mtha' los 'das pa stong pa nyid dben bu'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//thob ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i/
415b7('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngon pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i
416a1('bum): phyir shes rab kyi phyi rol tu 'on pa dben pa'o//chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//rang gi mtshan nyid sna
416a2('bum): nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//ngem pa med
416a3('bum): stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//dngos po med
416a4('bum): de'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//dran pa nye bar bzhog pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//
416a5('bum): yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//da
416a6('bum): po dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pani//stobs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i/
416a7('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dper ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//'phags pa'i
416b1('bum): bden po dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//bsam gtan dpon pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//tshad med pa dben pa'i phyir//
416b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//rnam par thar pa dben
416b3('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug po dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//rnam par thar///
416b4('bum): ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan mo med pa dang /smon pa med pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
416b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//de bzhin
416b6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben po'o//mi 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir shes rlob kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//so so yang dag
416b7('bum): par rig pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//byams pa chen po dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//snying rje chen po dben pa'i
417a1('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben du'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir sh+los rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//rgyun du
417a2('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//phyir
417a3('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//dgra bcom pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rob kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//rang byang
417a4('bum): chub dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben po'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//rnam pa thams
417a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//lha'i bu dag gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad da
417a6('bum): par bsha pa la sems mi 'dzum/yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur la/de'i yid 'jigs par mi 'gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
417a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'od srung ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byo ci'i phyir rgya chu sems
417b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur ba yin/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad nu mchis pa'i slad du byang chub
417b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dben pa dang zhi ba dang /ma skyes pa'i slad du
417b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur te/bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
417b4('bum): pau shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bum par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang zhum par 'gyur ba dang /gang gis zhum par
417b5('bum): 'gyur pa dang /gang la bum par 'gyur pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ma mchis pa ste/dmigs su ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
417b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de skad du bshud pa la mi 'dzum mi 'gong zhing tshi chad pa dang /sgyid lug par mi 'gyur la mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur na/shes
417b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang bum par 'gyur pa'am/gang gis zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/gang
418a1('bum): bum par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dbang
418a2('bum): po dang bcas tshangs pa dang bcas/skye dbu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis phyag bgyi bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
418a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni dbang po dang bcas/tshangs pa dang bcas/skye dgu'i bdag po dang
418a4('bum): bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis phyag bya bar yang ma zad de/gang 'phags pa mngon par 'phags pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa dge rgyas dang /'bras bu che ba dang /gnas gtsang
418a5('bum): ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la phyag bya bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor
418a6('bum): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dog par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med tshad med pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs
418a7('bum): shing /'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la dgongs pa mdzad de/byang chub sems
418b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
418b2('bum): su rdzogs par byed pa'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//bsam gtan
418b3('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//phyi
418b4('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//chen po stong pa
418b5('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//'dus ma byas stong pa
418b6('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o///
418b7('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//
419a1('bum): rang gi martan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//mi dmigs pa spyod pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//dngos po med pa spyod pa nyid yongs
419a2('bum): su rdzogs par byed pa'o//ngo rje nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag
419a3('bum): pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//dbang po lnga
419a4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//'phags pa'i lam yan lag
419a5('bum): brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//'phags pa'i bden po bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//tshad med
419a6('bum): pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o///
419a7('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i sgom so par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa yongs su
419b1('bum): rdzogs par byed pa'o//mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs
419b2('bum): par byed pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
419b3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs byar byed pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
419b4('bum): brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//lan cig phyir 'ong po'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//
419b5('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su rdzogos par byed pa'o//rang byang chub yongs su rdzogs par byeng pa'o//lam gyi rnam
419b6('bum): po shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o zhes dbyings pa mdzad do//rab 'byor byang chub sems
419b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
420a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar zhugs par rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/
420a2('bum): sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad dadud b+h+r-i kr-i to can du gyur te/bdud sdig ta can de dag ro res kyang de snyed kyi bdud sdig to can mngon par sprul kyang de dag
420a3('bum): thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po del bar chad bya bar mi nus so//rab 'byor chos gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
420a4('bum): chen po ni bdud sdig te can rnams kyis mi thub bya yin te/gnyis gang na no/des chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya bar rnam par bltos pa yin/des sems can thams
420a5('bum): cad klung yongs su ma btang ba yin te/rab 'byor cho bo 'dri gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig to can rnams kyis mi thub pa
420a6('bum): yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis dang ldan pa bdud sdig to can rnams
420a7('bum): kyis mi thub pa yin te/gnyis gang zhe na/ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin te/rab 'byor shes
420b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos de gnyis dang ldan pa ni/bdud sdig to can rnams kyis mi thub pa yin no//rab 'byor de

420b3('bum): 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi byang chub myur du thob byar 'gyur gyis de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di lta ste/stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa dang /mtshan

423b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /chos thams cad skye ba med par mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa dang //
423b7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bya ba dang /chos thams cad zhi ba'o zhes bya ba dang /chos thams cad gsog gsob ste/rag luso pa'o zhes bya ba dang /snying po med pa
424a1('bum): zhes bya bar mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma thob pa de dag la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing cheng ngu

425a7('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs po gzhan dmigs su med de/de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su med na/de bzhin nyid la gnas par
425b1('bum): bgyur ba dang /de bzhin nyid la gnas hU~M/bla na med pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rtsub dang /de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chas ston par 'gyur ba lta ci snyam
425b2('bum): drin gnas med do zhes zer ba ni/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no//rab 'byor gang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang /gang

425b5('bum): dang /de bzhin nyid la gnas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba dang /de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston
425b6('bum): par 'gyur ba lta ci sa te/de ni gnas med de//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang yang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung
425b7('bum): yang rung te/tshib rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhon nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chas nyid ni gnas pa'o//chas rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings
426a1('bum): dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni gnas pa ste/rab 'byor de bzhin nyid 'di la ni gang yang gnas/
426a2('bum): pAr 'gyur ba med de/de la gnas shing dran med pa yod dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba su'ang med na de la gnas
426a3('bum): shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/de ni gnas med do//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
426a4('bum): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
426a5('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis
426a6('bum): te/su'ang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa ma mchis la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang grang yang ma mchis te//
426a7('bum): chos ston pa'ang gang yang ma mchis la/des zhum par yang mi 'gyur zhing de dag la nem nur du 'gyur ba 'am/rmongs par 'gyur ba ma mchis pa ni dka' ba bgyid
426b1('bum): pa'o//de nas gnas btan rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//kau shi ka gang khyod kyis 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
426b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang chos zab mo 'di dag la nem nur du mi 'gyur/rmongs par mi 'gyur ba ni/dka' ba bgyid pa'o zhes gsol pa ni/kau shi ka chos thams cad
426b3('bum): stong pa yin na/de la nem nur du 'gyur ba 'am/rmongs par 'gyur ba lta su zhig yod/brgya byin gyis smras pa/gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gang ni ston kyang de thams
426b4('bum): tsang stong pa nyid brtsams shing ston te/ci la'ang chags pa med do//'di lta ste dper na bar snang la 'phangs pa'i mda' ni ci la'ang chags pa med do//de bzhin du gnas
426b5('bum): brtan rab 'byor gyis chos bstan pa'ang ci la'ang chags pa med do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/le'u bzhi bcu dgu pa'o////de nas/
426b6('bum): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci lags/bdag gis 'di skad du gsol te/de skad du brjod pas/bcom
426b7('bum): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rjes su brjod pa dang /chos su brjod cing chos kyi gnyer ba'i chos nyid yang dag par lung bstan pas lung bstan par 'gyur ba lags
427a1('bum): sam/bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka gang khyod kyis de skad du smras te/de skad du brjod pas/de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
427a2('bum): pa'i rjes su brjod pa dang /chos su brjod cing chos kyi gnyer ba'i chos nyid lung ston par 'gyur ro//brgya byin gyis gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan
427a3('bum): rab 'byor 'dis ci dang ci spobs pa de thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/mtshan ma ma mchis pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/smon pa ma mchis pa nyid brtsams
427a4('bum): shing spobs/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
427a5('bum): brtsams shing spobs/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/bsam gau tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/shes rab kyi
427a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs pa dang /nad stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/phyi stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/phyi nang stong pa nyid brtsams shing
427a7('bum): spobs/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/chen po stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/don dam pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing slebs/'dus byas stong pa nyid
427b1('bum): brtsams shing spobs/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/mtha' lus 'das pa skyong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid brtsams/
427b2('bum): shing stobs/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/rang bzhin stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/chos thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/rang gi mtshan
427b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtsams
427b4('bum): shing spobs/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/yang dag par spong ba rnams brtsams
427b5('bum): shing spobs/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/dbang po rnams brtsams shing spobs/stobs rnams brtsams shing spobs/byang chub kyi yan lag
427b6('bum): rnams brtsams shing spobs/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa brtsams shing spobs pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/bsam gtan
427b7('bum): rnams brtsams shing spobs/chad med pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/rnam par thar pa rnams
428a1('bum): brtsams shing spobs/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med
428a2('bum): pa dang smon pa med pa brtsams shing spobs/mngon par shes pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ting nge 'dzin rnams brtsams shing spobs/gzungs kyi sgo rnams brtsams
428a3('bum): shing spobs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams brtsams shing spobs/mi 'jigs pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams brtsams
428a4('bum): shing spobs/byams pa chen po brtsams shing spobs/snying rje chen po brtsams shing spobs/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams brtsams shing spobs pa dang //
428a5('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs/dgra
428a6('bum): bcom pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/rang byang chub brtsams shing spobs/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid brtsams shing spob sa/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
428a7('bum): brtsams shing spobs pa ngo mtshar che'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka gnas brtan rab 'byor stong pa nyid la rnam par spyod pas/sbyin pa'i pha
428b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/glang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/byang tshul
428b2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/brtsom

428b4('bum): na/gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
428b5('bum): lta ci smos/nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang nang stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/phyi stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang phyi stong pa nyid la bsgom po lta
428b6('bum): tsaM smos/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang phyi nung stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/stong pa nyid stong bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na/grang stong pa nyid stong
428b7('bum): pa nyid la bsgom pa lnga ci smos/chen po stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang chen po stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na//
429a1('bum): gang don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci
429a2('bum): smos/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na//
429a3('bum): gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/thog mo dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la
429a4('bum): bsgom pa lta ci smos/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na//
429a5('bum): gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos//
429a6('bum): rlung gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs ni/gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang
429a7('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/
429b1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta ci smos/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gang dngos po med pa'i
429b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lha ci smos/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/gang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/yang dag
429b3('bum): par song ba rnams kyang mi dmigs na/gang yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/gang rdzu 'phrul gyi
429b4('bum): rkang pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/dbang po rnams kyang mi dmigs na/gang dbang po rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/stobs rnams kyang mi dmigs na/gang stobs
429b5('bum): rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/byang chub kyi lan lag rnams kyang mi dmigs na/gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/'phags pa'i lam
429b6('bum): yan lag brgyad ba'ang mi dmigs na/gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsgom pa lta ci smos/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na//
429b7('bum): gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/bsam gtan rnams kyang mi dmigs na/gang bsam gtan rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/tshang
430a1('bum): med pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/gang tshad med pa rnams la bsgom pa lta ci smos/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi
