488b1('bum): chen po bai ron 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang
488b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /lus dang sems kyi brtson pa mi 'dor ba yin te/dra dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par
488b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar mi bya'i/bdag gis gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
488b4('bum): 'chang rgya bar bya'o zhes de sems can rnams kyi don du dpag tshad dam/dpag tshad brgya'am/dpag tshad stong ngam/dpag ched brgya phrag stong ngam/'jig rten gyi khams/
488b5('bum): sam/'jig rten gyi khams brgya 'am/'jig rten gyi khams stong ngam/'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong ngam/'jig rten gyi khams bye ba 'am/'jig rten gyi khams
488b6('bum): bye ba brgya 'am/'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong ngam/'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dag tu song zhing /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
488b7('bum): rlung du na sems can 'a'i tsam yang byang chub la rab tu gzhog go/gal te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang ma phrad na'ang de dag tu gang zag nyan thos kyi thog
489a1('bum): pa ni nyan grol la rab tu gzhog/gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa nI rang sangs rgyas la rab tu gzhog ste/chung ngu na sems can 'ga' tsam yang dge ba
489a2('bum): bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu gzhog go//des chos kyi sbyin pa de dag byin nas/zang zing gi sbyin pas sems can rnams tshim par byed de/dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang nyan thos kyi sa
489a3('bum): 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'o/gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
489a4('bum): tu yongs su bsngo ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin po yongs
489a5('bum): su 'dzin to//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnaso shing /tshul khrims kyi pha rol
489a6('bum): tu byin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas
489a7('bum): nye bar bzung ste/snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du bdag gis kyang srog gcod po spangs pa yin/gzhan yang srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag paro skul tha
489b1('bum): /yin/srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/da shAn gang gis srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi logs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/bdag/
489b2('bum): gis kyang ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin/gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/ma byin par len pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin//
489b3('bum): gzhan gang gis ma byin par len pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/bdag gis kyang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa yin//
489b4('bum): gzhan yang 'dod paso log par g.yem pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/gzhan gang gis 'dod
489b5('bum): pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/bdag gis kyang brdzun du smra ba spangs pa yin/gzhan yang brdzun du smra ba/
489b6('bum): spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/brdzun du smra ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/gzhan gang gis brdzun du smra ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga'
489b7('bum): bar byed pa yin/bdag gis kyang phra ma spangs pa yin/gzhan yang phra ma spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/phra ma spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/gzhan gang gis phra//
490a1('bum): ma spangs pa de dag ga lags pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/bdag gis kyang zhe gcod pa'i cho ga spangs pa yin/gzhan yang zhe gtsod
490a2('bum): pa'i tshig spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/zhe bcod pa'i tshig spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/gzhan gang gis zhe gcad pa'i tshig spangs pa de dag gi legs
490a3('bum): pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/bdag gis kyang tshig bkyil pa spangs pa yin/gzhan yang tshig bkyil pa spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/tshig dkyil
490a4('bum): pa spang ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/gzhan gang gis tshig bkyil pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/bdag gis kyang chags
490a5('bum): sems spangs pa yin/gzhan yang chags sems spong ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/chags sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/gzhan gang gis chags
490a6('bum): sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/bdag gis kyang gnod sems spangs pa yan/gzhan yang gnod sems stong
490a7('bum): ba la yang dag par skul ba yin/gnod sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/gzhan gang gis gnod sems spangs pa de dag pi legs pa brjod cing mthun//
490b1('bum): sa dga' bar byed pa yin/bdag gis kyang log par lta ba spangs pa yin/gzhan yang log par lta spong ba la yang dam par skul ba yin/log par lta ba spong ba'i
490b2('bum): legs pa brjod pa yin/gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi lags pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin te/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des
490b3('bum): 'dod pa'i khams su gnas par mi byed/gzugs kyi khams su gnas par mi byeng /gzugs med pa'i khams su gnas par mi byed/nyan thos kyi sa'am/rang sangs rgyas
490b4('bum): kyi sa la gnas par mi byed de/gzhon du na dge ba'i rtsa bu de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
490b5('bum): su bsngo ste/ci nas kyang gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /ci yongs su bsngo ba dang /gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i blo rnam pa gsum du mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsdu ste/rab
490b6('bum): 'byor de ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to//gsol/
490b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
491a1('bum): 'dzin pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di lo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyod pa nas
491a2('bum): nye bar bzung ste snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mir gyur pa'am/mi ma yin par gyur pas/sems rnam par 'khrugs par byas pa'am/yan lag dong nyid
491a3('bum): lhag bcad gtubs shong /khyer te dang yang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de 'di snyam du bdag las ci
491a4('bum): zhig bcad do//bdag las ci zhigro gtubs so//bdag las ci zhig khyer ro zhes bya bar mi sems te/gzhan du na de 'di snyam du gang gi phyir bdag gi lus yongs
491a5('bum): su bsgrubs pa de dag 'dire 'ong zhing yan lag dang nying lag bcud gtubs nas khyor zhing 'dong ba ni bdag gis thob par bya ba legs par thob bo snyam mo/de ni chos
491a6('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin yang legs par yidra la byas te/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyon thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongs su mi bsngo'i/gzhan du na sems
491a7('bum): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
491b1('bum): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems
491b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
491b3('bum): pab/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben/sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa drang bcas pa/
491b4('bum): dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhe nas nang yongs
491b5('bum): su dang ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa/ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar
491b6('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so//de dga' ba lngas 'dod chags dang bral bas/dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa
491b7('bum): rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te
492a1('bum): gnas so//de bde ba'ang spangs sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing /yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/bde ba'ang med sdug
492a2('bum): bsngal ba'ang med btang snyoms pa dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de sems can rnams la bde ba'i 'du
492a3('bum): shes yid lnga byed pas/byams pa tshad med pa la nye bar bsrubs te gnas so//de sems can rnams la sdug bsngal ba dang bral ba'i 'du shes yid la byed
492a4('bum): pas/snying rje ched med pa lo nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de sems can rnams la dga' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas/dga'i' ba tshad med pa la nye bar bsgribs
492a5('bum): te gnas so//de sems can rnams l-i sdug bsngal dang bde ba med pa'i 'du shes yid la byed pas/btang snyoms tshad med pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so///
492a6('bum): de gzugs la tshe long du 'du shes shing nam mkha' la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la byed pas/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
492a7('bum): so//de nam mkha' la tshe long du 'du shes shing rnam par shes pa la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la byed pas/rnam sheso mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs///
492b1('bum): te gnas so//de rnam par shes pa la tshe long du 'du shes shing cung zad med pa la zhi bar 'du shes pa yid la byed pas/cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs //
492b2('bum): te gnas so//de cung zad med pa la che long du 'du shes shing 'du shes med 'du shes med ma ni la zhi bar 'du shes par yid la byed pas/'du shes med 'du shes
492b3('bum): mang min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa yongs
492b4('bum): su mi len te gzhan du na/sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i phyir/de dag tu skye zhing sems can de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
492b5('bum): dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /pha rol tu phyin
492b6('bum): pa drug po 'di dag la yongs su smin par byed do//dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa'i don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
492b7('bum): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gonas shing /bsam gtan gyi
493a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
493a2('bum): byin pa la gnas shing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
493a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag por rjes su mi mthong /
493a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po dang rjes dang mtshan mar yang
493a5('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos
493a6('bum): po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /rlung stong pa
493a7('bum): nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthang /phyi stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /byi nang stong pa
493b1('bum): nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /chen po stong
493b2('bum): pa nyid dngos po dang rjes dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthar /don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /'dus byas
493b3('bum): stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /'dus mu byas stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong //
493b4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang
493b5('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar
493b6('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas drang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po dang
493b7('bum): rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /dngos po med pa
494a1('bum): stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi
494a2('bum): mthong /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan
494a3('bum): mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dngos po dang rdzas
494a4('bum): dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /dbang po lnga dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /stobs lnga dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar
494a5('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
494a6('bum): dngos po dang rdzus dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dngos po dang rjes dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /bsam
494a7('bum): gtan bzhi dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /tshad med pa bzhi dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /gzugs
494b1('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dngos po dang rdzus dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /rnam par thar pa brgyad dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan marA yung dag
494b2('bum): par rjes su mi mthong /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
494b3('bum): dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dngos po dang rdzus dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /mngon par shes pa rnams dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan
494b4('bum): mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /ting nge 'dzin rnams dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dngos po dang rdzas dang
494b5('bum): mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /mi 'jigs pa bzhi
494b6('bum): dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong //
494b7('bum): byams pa chen po dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /snying rje chen po dngos po dang rjes dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
495a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyud dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /thams cad shes pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang /
495a2('bum): mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
495a3('bum): pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan ma ra yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/chos thams cad dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas/chos
495a4('bum): gang la'ang gnas mi 'cha' zhing /de ji skad du smra ba de ltar byed pa yin te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha
495a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//bam po nyis
495a6('bum): brgyang gsum pa//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sbyin pa'i pha rol
495a7('bum): tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dbe na sdig to mo dge
495b1('bum): ba'i chos kyis dben pa/rtag pa dang bcas pa dpyad pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam
495b2('bum): par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhe nas nong yongs su dang ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/rtog pa med pa dpyod pa myed pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /
495b3('bum): bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te//
495b4('bum): bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa
495b5('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de bde ba'ang spangs/sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba'ang med/sdug bsngal yang
495b6('bum): med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par
495b7('bum): 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/nam mkha' mtha' yas
496a1('bum): skye mched la nye bar bsgrungs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa
496a2('bum): mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das
496a3('bum): te/cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de rnam pa thams cad du de cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das
496a4('bum): te/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnas nas/mi g.yeng ba'i yid kyis
496a5('bum): sems can de dag la zang zing gi sbyin pa drang /chos kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /gzhan yang zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /chos kyi sbyin pa la yang dgra par skul lo//
496a6('bum): zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /chos kyi sbyin pa'i legs pa'ang brjod do//gzhan gang zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /chos kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi legs pa'ang
496a7('bum): brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin te/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo'i/gzhan du na sems can
496b1('bum): thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
496b2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin po yongs su 'dzin to//gsol ba/bcom ldan 'angs ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
496b3('bum): dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin po la gnas shing /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
496b4('bum): rab 'byor 'dri la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i sems 'dod chags dang ldan pa mi skyed/sems zhe sdang
496b5('bum): dang ldan pa mi skrod/sems gti mug dang ldan pa mi skyed/sems 'tsho ba dang ldan pa mi skyed kyi gzhan du na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
496b6('bum): byed pas rnam par spyod de/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongs su mi bsngo'i/gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong
496b7('bum): du byas shing /blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa tran
497a1('bum): sems da pa sam gtan phyin pa la gnas shing / sa yongs su dzin pa lagasanadang
497a2('bum): na 'ang sa byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen gyi bsam gtan gyi ba phyin pa la gnas shing /gzugs la dbu snru
497b1('bum): skye ba de lta bu'i grwa sho ba'ang gang zhig yod snyam ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /bzod
497b2('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
497b3('bum): shing /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
497b4('bum): po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las
497b5('bum): skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te glanas so//de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye ba ro zhi nas/nang yongs su dang ste/
497b6('bum): sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin lngas skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te
497b7('bum): gnas so//de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral ba dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams
498a1('bum): kyis dran pa dang ldan pa/bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te/
498a2('bum): gnas so//de bang ba'ang spangs/sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/bde ba'ang med/sdug bsngal yang med pa
498a3('bum): btang snyoms drang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/de bsam gtan dang bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag la'ang
498a4('bum): mtshan mar mi 'dzin to//de de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems dang ldan pas/rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed de/sa chen po 'di'ang rab tu g.yo bar
498a5('bum): byed do//gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ro//mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ro//snang ba dang mi snang ba'ang nyams su myong bar byed do//rtsig pa las thal
498a6('bum): bo dang /ra ba las thal ba dang /ri las thal bar thogs pa med par 'gro ste/dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no//nam mkha' la'ang 'gro ste/dper na 'dab
498a7('bum): chags bya bzhin no//sa la'ang gyen du 'byung ba dang /'og tu 'dzul ba byed de/dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no//chu la'ang bying ba med par 'gro ste/dper na sa la
498b1('bum): bya ba bzhin no//ngu bar 'thul zhi ngo mor 'bar to/dper na mo'i phung po chen po bzhin no//nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul tsho la/'di ltar mthu tsho zhing dbang che ba dag
498b2('bum): kyang lag pas byugs shing /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur ro//de lha'i rnang rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas lha dang mi'i sgra nye ba 'am/ring yang rung
498b3('bum): ste/thos so//des sems can pha rol dang /gang zag pha rol gyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la//
498b4('bum): 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes
498b5('bum): bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rob tu shes so//zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya ba ru yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhi ni du rab tu shes
498b6('bum): so//zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems la/zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems la/gti
498b7('bum): mug dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dge ba ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la/gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar
499a1('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems la/sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
499a2('bum): ra tu shes so//sred pa dang bral ba'i sems la/sred pa dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//nye bar len pa dang bcas
499a3('bum): d+ha'i sems la/nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//nye bar len pa med pa'i sems la/nye bar len pa
499a4('bum): medra pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//kun nas 'dus pa'i sems la/kun nas 'dus pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba
499a5('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so//rnam par 'bros pa'i sems la/rnam par 'phros pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du rab tu shos so//rgya chung ba'i sems
499a6('bum): la/rgya chung ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//rgya che ba'i sems lnga/rgya che ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba
499a7('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so//yangs po'i sems la/yangs pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//tshad med pa'i sems la/tshad
499b1('bum): medra pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//mnyam par bzhag pa'o sems la/mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba//
499b2('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so//mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la/mnyam par ma bzhug pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du rab tu shes so//rnam par
499b3('bum): grol ba'i sems la/rnam par grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//rnam par ma grol ba'i sems la/rnam par ma gol ba'i
499b4('bum): sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la/zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba
499b5('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so//zag pa med pa'i sems la/zag pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//nyon mongs pa dang btsas pa'i
499b6('bum): sems la/nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la/nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems
499b7('bum): zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//bla na yod pa'i sems la/bla na yod pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
500a1('bum): bla na med pa'i sems la/bla na med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//de ni sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te//
500a2('bum): sems gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/sems brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no//nyi ma gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/nyi ma brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no//zla ba gcig rjes//
500a3('bum): su dran pa nas/zla ba brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no//lo gcig rjes su dran pa nas/lo brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no//bskal pa gcig rjes su dran pa nas/bskal pa
500a4('bum): brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no//bskal pa brgya phrag du ma'ang rjes su dran no//bskal pa stong phrag du ma'ang rjes su dran no//bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma'ang rjes su dran
500a5('bum): no//bskal pa bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong du ma'ang rjes su dran no//bdag ni de lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ming ni 'di zhes bya/rus ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya//
500a6('bum): kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/yun na 'di srid cig tu 'dug 'dug/tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/de ltar bdag de nas shi 'phos nas/che ge mo zhig tu skyes so
500a7('bum): zhes bya ba nas/de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/gtan tshigs dang bcas dan rtags dang bcas par bdag dang gzhon gyi
500b1('bum): sngon gyi gnas dam pa du mar rjes su dran do//de ni lha'i mig rnam par dag pa/mi las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'jo ba dang /skye ba dang kha dog sdug pa dang /mi sdug pa dang /bzang ba/
500b2('bum): dang /ngan pa dang /dran sdang na gnas pa dang /bde 'gro na gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes te/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis dran du spyod pa dang ldan/ngag gis ngan du
500b3('bum): spyod pa dang ldan/yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa rnams la bskur ba 'debs pa/log par lta ba rnams te/de'i rgyu deb rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song dang /
500b4('bum): ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o//sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/yid
500b5('bum): kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/'phags pa la sbyor pa mi 'debs pa/yang dag par lta ba rnams te/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas/bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig
500b6('bum): rten lha'i nang du skyo bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/nam mkha'i mthas gdugs pa
500b7('bum): dag gi 'gro ba drug tu gtogs pa rnams kyi skye ba dang /'chi 'pho ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/de mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag la rab tu gnas nas//
501a1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /yangs su dri ba dang /yongs su zhu ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang /sems can
501a2('bum): yongs su smin par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang nyan thos kyis
501a3('bum): 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bcwo'i/gzhan dur semos can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ngu yongs
501a4('bum): su bsde zhing /ci nas kyang gang yongs su bsngo ba dang /yongs su bsngo ba dang /gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i dro rnam pa gsum du mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsdu ste/rang
501a5('bum): 'byorar+ya de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin tu/
501a6('bum): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
501a7('bum): yongs su 'dzin pa legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin/
501b1('bum): pa la gnas pas/gzugs mi dmigs so//tshor ba mi dmigros so//'du shes mi dra migs so//'du byed mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so//mig mi
501b2('bum): dmigs so//rna ba mi dmigs so//snga mi dmigs so// mi dmigs so//lus mi dmigs so//yid mi dmigs so//gzugs mo dmigs so//sgra mi dmigs so//
501b3('bum): dri mi dmigs so//ro mi dmigs so//reg mi dmigs so//chos mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so//rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs
501b4('bum): so/sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so//lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so//lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so//yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs
501b5('bum): so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs so//lus kyi
501b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
501b7('bum): pa'i tshor ba mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te rog pa las byung ba'i tshor ba me dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus
502a1('bum): tAM reg pa las byung ba'i tshur ba mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs so//sa'i khams mi dmigs so//chu'i khams
502a2('bum): mi dmigs so//mo'i khams mi dmigs so//rlung gi khams mi dmigs so//nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so//ma
502a3('bum): rig pa mi dmigs so//'du byed mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so//ming dang gzugs mi dmigs so//skye mched drug mi dmigs so//reg pa mi
502a4('bum): dmigs so//tsho ra ba me dri migs so//sred pa mi dmigs so//len pa mi dmigs so//srid pa mi dmigs so//skye ba mi dmigs so//rga shi mi dmigs so//
502a5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du
502a6('bum): bA me da migs so//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//nAng stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid
502a7('bum): mi dmigs so//phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs
502b1('bum): so//'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
502b2('bum): nyid mi dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan
502b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//dngos po
502b4('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bani mi dmigs so//yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi dmigs so//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mi
502b5('bum): dmigs so//dbang po lnga mi dmigs so//stobs lnga mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs
502b6('bum): so//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mi dmigs so//bsam gtan bzhi mi dmigs so//tshad med pa bzhi mi dmigs so//gzugs med pa'i snyoms por 'jug pa bzhi
502b7('bum): mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa brgyad mi dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
503a1('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mi dmigs so//mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs so//gzungs kyo sgo rnams
503a2('bum): mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs so//mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi dmigs so//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi dmigs so//byams pa chen
503a3('bum): po mi dmigs so//snying rje chen po mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs so//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so//lan cig phyir
503a4('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so//ngag bcom pa nyid mi dmigs so//rang bang chub mi dmigs so//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
503a5('bum): nyid mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so//'dus byas kyi khams mi dmigs so//'dus mo byas kyi khams mi dmigs so//de ltar mi dmigs
503a6('bum): pas na/mngon par 'du mi byed do//mngon par 'du mi byed pas na/skye bar mo byed/'gag par mi byed do//de ci'i phyi zhe na/rab 'byor/de ni 'di ltar dri bzhin
503a7('bum): gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste/chos rnams kyi chos kyi gnas nyid de ni gnas po ste/chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gnos pa'i phyir/de mi skye mi
503b1('bum): 'gag pas/de g.yeng ba med pa'i sems dang ldan par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mu bral ba yin te/rab 'byor de ltar na/byang
503b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to//gsol pa/bcom ldan
503b3('bum): 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/bcom
503b4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes
503b5('bum): bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //gsol po/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
503b6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bgyi bar rjes su mthong ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
503b7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so//phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs
504a1('bum): so//phyi nang stong pa nyid la byi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la snang ba nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so//
504a2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so//don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar m+bi dmigs so//'dus byas stong pa
504a3('bum): nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so//mtha' las 'das pa stong
504a4('bum): nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs
504a5('bum): so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so//
504a6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar mi
504a7('bum): dmigs so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de stong pa nyid bcu bzhi po de dag la gnas shing /gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar
504b1('bum): mi migs so//tshor ba stong zhes bya ba'am mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//'du shes stong zhes bya ba'am/mo stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//'du byed stong
504b2('bum): zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//mig sbyong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong
504b3('bum): zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//rna ba stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//sna stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//lha stong
504b4('bum): zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmig so so//lus stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//yid stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi
504b5('bum): dmigs so//gzugs stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//sgra stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//dri stong zhes bya ba
504b6('bum): 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//ro steng zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi de migaso so//reg steng zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs
504b7('bum): so//chos stong zhes bya ba 'am/ma stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//rna ba'i
505a1('bum): rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/mo stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//sna'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/m-i stong zhes bya bar rma/
505a2('bum): dmigs so//lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi
505a3('bum): dmigs so//yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar
505a4('bum): mi dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi
505a5('bum): dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba 'om/mi stong zhes bya b.ro mi dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi
505a6('bum): dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa lngas byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya ba 'am/
505a7('bum): mi stong zhes bya bar me dmigs so//rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung po'i tsher ba stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//sna'i 'dus te reg pa
505b1('bum): las byung ba'i tshor bskong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya ba 'am/mI stong zhes bya bar mi
505b2('bum): dmigs so//lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher bstong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya ba
505b3('bum): 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//sa'i khams stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//chu'i khams stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar
505b4('bum): mi dmigs so//me'i khams stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//rlung gi khams stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//nam mkha'i
505b5('bum): khams stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigaso so//rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//ma rig pa
505b6('bum): stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//'du byed stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/
505b7('bum): mo stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//ming dang gzugs stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//skye mched drug stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya
506a1('bum): nabar mo dmigs so//ron rgyu ba nas bya ngam shAng na nga mang sogs so/ bstong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs
506a2('bum): s+ho//sred pa stong zhes bya bya 'am/mi snang zhes bya bar mo dmigs so//len pa stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stang zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//srid pa stong zhes bya ba'am/
506a3('bum): mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//skye ba stong zhes bya ba'am/mi sbyong zhes bya bar mo dngagus so//rga shi stong zhes bya ba'am/me stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//
506a4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigaso so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs/

506b1('bum): zhes bya bar mi dmyigs so//phyi nang stong bya nyid stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya

506b4('bum): bya bar mi dmigs so//mtha' lus 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes
506b5('bum): bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'amo/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong
506b6('bum): zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//chos thams cad sdang pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//rang gi mtshan nyid
506b7('bum): stong po nyid stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//mi dmigs pa stong po nyid stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//dngos
507a1('bum): be med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar myi dmigs/
507a2('bum): so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//dran pa nye bar bzhag po bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes

507a5('bum): so byang chub kyi yan lag bdun stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bo 'am/mi stong

507b1('bum): stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//rnam par thar pa brgyad stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//mthar gyis gnas pa'i

507b5('bum): pa'i stobs bcu stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//mi 'jigs pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//so so/
507b6('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//byams pa chen po stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//
507b7('bum): snying rje chen po stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi
508a1('bum): dmigs so//rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar myi dmigs so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya ba

508a4('bum): stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmi gos so//'dus byos kyi khams stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs so//'dus ma byas kyi khams
508a5('bum): stob zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi dmigs te/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod cing zas sam/skom
508a6('bum): mam/bzhon pa 'am/bros sam/me tog gam/phreng ba 'am/spos sam/byug pa'am/mal cha'am/gnas sum/'tsho ba 'am/yo byad ngam/mi'i yo byad
508a7('bum): gzhan gang yang rung ba sbyin pa gang dang gang gtong yang des sbyin pa de stong pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //gang yongs su gtong ba dang /gong/
508b1('bum): la yongs su gtong ba de'ang stong pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/de la 'jungs pa'i sems sam/yongs su 'dzin pa'i snyoms kyi skabs med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
508b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du rnam
508b3('bum): par rtog pa de dag thams cad med de/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
508b4('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la ji ltar 'jungs pa'i thugs sam/yongs su 'dzin pa'i thugs mi mnga' ba de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
508b5('bum): bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la'ang 'jungs pa'i sems sam/yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems skye ba med do//'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid
508b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ston pa'o//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /
508b7('bum): sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
509a1('bum): gnas shing /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
509a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gonas shing /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go skabs mi 'byed do//de ci'i phyiraro zhe ni/de ni
509a3('bum): 'di ltar des nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyis gang du yongs su bsngo ba de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rlung sangs rgyas kyi sa 'ong mi dmigs/sems de'ang
509a4('bum): mi dmigs te/de sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du bdag gis kyang sreg gcod pa spangs pa yin/gzhan yang
509a5('bum): srog gcod pa spong ba la yang dag paro bskul ba yin/srog gcod pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yini/gzhan gang gis srog gcod pa spangs pa de dag gi
509a6('bum): legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bde byed pa yi na/bdag gis kyang ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin/gzhan yang ma byin par len pa spong ba la yang dag
509a7('bum): par bskul ba yin/ma byin par len pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/gzhan gang gis ma byin par len pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun
509b1('bum): ngasu dga' bar byed pa yin/bdag gis kyang 'dod pas log par g.yom pa spongs pa yin/gzhan yang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba
509b2('bum): yin/'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/gzhan gang gis 'dod pas leg par g.yem pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjode cing
509b3('bum): mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/bdag gis kyang brdzun du smra ba spangs pa yin/gzhan yang brdzun du sla ba spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin/brdzun du sla ba
509b4('bum): spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/gzhan gang gis brdzun du skye ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/bdag gis kyang phra mo spangs
509b5('bum): pa yin/gzhan yang phra ma spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin/pra ma spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/gzhan grang gis phra ma spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod
509b6('bum): cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/bdag gis kyang zhe gcod pa'i tshig spangs pa yin/gzan yang zhe gcod pa'o tshig spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin/zhe
509b7('bum): gcod pa'i tshig spong ba'i logs pa brjod pa yin/gzhan gang gis zhe gcod pa'i tshig spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin//
510a1('bum): bdag gi kyang tshig brtsal pa spangs pa yin/gzhan yang tshig bkyil pa spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin/tshig bkyil du spong ba'i legs pa 'arjod/
510a2('bum): pa yin/gzhan gang gis tshig bkyal pa spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/bdag gis kyang chags sems spangs pa yin//
510a3('bum): gzhan yang chags sems spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin/chags sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/gzhan gang gis chags sems spangs pa de dag gi
510a4('bum): legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/bdag gis kyang gnod sems spangs pa yin/gzhan yang gnod sems spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin/
510a5('bum): gnod sems spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/gzhan gang gis gnod sems spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin/bdag
510a6('bum): gis kyang log par lta ba spangs pa yin/gzhan yang log par lta ba spong ba la yang dag par bskul ba yin/log par lta ba spong ba'i legs pa brjod pa yin/
510a7('bum): gzhan gang gis log par lta ba spangs pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar byed pa yin te/tshul khrims des nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi
510b1('bum): chos dang lnga'ang chags par mi 'gyur na/gzhan man chad lta la ci smos te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
510b2('bum): gnas shing /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to//gsol ba/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
510b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
510b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa skyes te/de 'di snyam du 'od la chos gang yod skye ba'am/'gag pa'am/'byung
510b5('bum): ba 'am/'jig pa'am/'chi ba 'am/glo she ba'am/'khyal pa 'am/bcad pa'am/gtub pa 'am/brdeg pa med do snyam pas de lo sems dang po bskyed pa nas te
510b6('bum): bar bzung ste/snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du gal te sems can+da thams cung drung du lhags nus skyo ste/dkyil tam/rdo dbyug gis brdegs sam/mtshon gyis
510b7('bum): btab spyi bcad gtubaso kyang de la 'di snyam ste/kye mchos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ni de /'di ma chos gang le 'ong spyo ba 'am/'amyal ba 'am/bcad /
511a1('bum): 'am/gtub pa 'am/brdeg pa'am/bcing ba med do snyam ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
511a2('bum): tu byin pa la gnas shing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
511a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ljags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
511a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la granas shing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas te/thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pos lus dang sems
511a5('bum): kyi brtson 'grus bskyed de/'jig rten gyi khams gcig gom/'jig rten gyi khams brgya 'am/'jig rten gyi khams stong ngam/'jig rten gyi khams brgya phyag stong
511a6('bum): dma?/'jig rten mo khams bye ba'am/'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya 'am/'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong ngam/'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phyag steng ngam/
511a7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrong /khrig brgya brag stong dag tu song ste/sems can rnams la chos ston cing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lo rab tu 'phod do//tshul
511b1('bum): khrims kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do//bsam gtan gyi
511b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'god do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'gyod do//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad la rab tu 'god do//rgyun du zhugs
511b3('bum): pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'grod do//dgra bcom pa nyid la rab
511b4('bum): tu 'god do//rang byang chub la rab tu 'god do//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god do//de'ang ci nas kyang 'dus byas kyi khams la rab
511b5('bum): tu bkod pa'ang ma yin/'dus ma byas kyi khams la rab tu bkod pa'ang ma yin pa de lta ro rab tu 'god de/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
511b6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo gnas shing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems
511b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
512a1('bum): sprul pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang nu bo shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la gra nas shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i tang /
512a2('bum): 'dzin ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin tam/rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tAma?/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang rung ste/ting nge 'dzin gang
512a3('bum): ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la snyoms par 'jug ste/ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas shing /rnam par thar pa brgyad la lugs dang mthun pa dang /lugs
512a4('bum): dang mi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo //brgyad gape rten/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpo'o sems dpa' chen po gzugapa can gyis
512a5('bum): gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par gyur pa dang po'o//nang gizugs med pa'i 'jo shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'drin rnam par ba
512a6('bum): ba gnyis pa'o//bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsub pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i
512a7('bum): 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/nam mkha'i mtha' yas so zhes te/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
512b1('bum): bar bslabs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mchod las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha'
512b2('bum): yas so zhes te/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
512b3('bum): las yang dag par 'das te/cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du

520b4('bum): spyad pa dang /rdul rnams kyi su phyin pa la spyod pa dang / na pa'i spyod pa dang /rtson rgya ma ma na pa la skyid pa dngo sa/
521a1('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa dang /shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs parla
521a2('bum): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/'di
521a3('bum): snyam du kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'drin sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa s+ho/de dag na thabs mkhas pas 'khor ba nas yongs su gdon par mi nus kyis/mi la bdag gis
521a4('bum): sems can de dag gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par

521a6('bum): nas/de sems can+da de dag gi don du phyi nang gi dngos po rnams yongs su gtong ste/de yongs su gtong ba'i tshe 'di snyam ste/badrag gis gang yang yongs su gtang ba

521b1('bum): chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//de snyoms can de dag nyid kyi don du tshul khrims ngan pa'i skabs mi 'byed de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar/

521b3('bum): bas log par g.yem pa dang /brdzun gyi tshig smra ba dang /phra ma can du 'gyur ba dang /zhe gcod pa'i tshig smra ba dang /tshig bkyil pa can du 'gyur ba dang /chags sems
